111.content:
Chapter 2: School starts
an addition by: Scorpion

As the day started and Alexios was walking with Rachel to school they chatted about this and that. Suddenly Rachel was pointing to a large house at the end of the street as they turned into the street that led to the school.

"So there is where she livs" Rachel said

"Who?" Alexios asked

"That teacher i was telling you about. You know that new class i am taking"

"Oh, yeah that vore class, right?"

"Yeah, she seem to be a really good teacher and it's going to be very interesting to see what we are going to do today"

"Well, i hope you are having more fun then i am" Alexios said and pushed his backpack back up on his back

"Why, what are you having then?"

"Math" He said and Rachel giggled

"Well, have fun at class then i'll see you on the break"

Then they both parted ways and went to there classes. As they all gathered and sat down the lesson started and after Miss Fulpin went though some facts and history behind vore she turned to the cages.

"Now i hoped you did your homework until today, because we are going to move on today and we are going to have a little test to make sure you all know the first lesson as it's the most important thing when you are going to swallow someone" She said and looked around to make sure everyone was paying attention to what she was saying.

"Now open the book at page 67 and we are going to look at the next steep in the process" She continued and the class went on until the bell rang

"Ok, if there isn't any questions then you may go on your break" Miss Filpin said and then as no one said anything the class ended and everyone gathered there books and started to leave

You now have the following 3 choices:

1. Miss Filpin stops Rachel for a private talk at her office

2. Rachel meets up with Alexios as planed

3. Samantha and her friend stops Rachel to pick on her

112.content:
*Thanks to Throku for this amazingly detailed chapter. Please be very careful about the facts involved if you wish to add to this thread. :)*




There is something odd with the class, everyone is in time to it, well in time
and as the Professor arrives the class sits quietly and ready. This is very odd
indeed, even more so considering that the class consists of only women about
200 of them. Had it been any other class the professor would have been lucky if
she could start in fifteen minutes or so, but now she’s able to start right
away.

The professor is pleased at what she sees and gives the students a warm and
honest smile.
The student’s are a bit surprised about the professor’s appearance. Last time
wore strict clothing, and a bit oversized too, making her look a bit plump.
Today however she wore more casual clothes, but she still appeared at least as
intimidating as she did last time.

The professor was wearing a pair of blue skin hugging jeans, rather low cut
such, and a rather tight blue-ish/ purple-ish top that matched. The ensemble
left her lower tummy and bellybutton bare, showing the students that she’s in
fact in good shape and well curved too. She actually looks very good for a lady
in her late 30-ies.

“Today we will demonstrate a few things. I know you’ll be better motivated to
study if you see there is progress to make. You have all managed to repress you
gag reflex, and at some point your body will find it unnecessary and you won’t
have a problem with gagging any more. Don’t worry this usually happens in the
first couple of weeks. Remember practice makes perfect, so the more you
practice the faster it will go away.”

“When you have managed to overcome your gag reflex then there is still the
problem with getting large object down your throat. Everything is easier if you
get help that is why we have paired you up two and two. So that one can help
the other and comment on her progress, tell her what she is doing wrong and
assisting. Eventually you’ll be able to swallow large enough objects to
practice on each other. Don’t worry if your companion gets to this point before
you do, who better to tell you what to do than someone who just crossed over
the last barrier?”

“Never hesitate to ask the TA’s for help, they are more than willing, they are
here to help. But you might have to be ready that they might prefer giving you
a physical example, rather than just telling you what to do. Once you manage to
swallow people you’ll understand them, it really is delicious.”

“Which brings me to the point of extra clothing. It really is necessary for you
to bring an extra set of clothes to the class. Even though it might take
several weeks before you are swallowed by your companion, someone else might
show you what it is like long before that, and I like to pick my “volunteers”
at random, so that it is fair to everyone.”

“Now to show you something more interesting. Stephanie would you come over
here?“

The redheaded TA made her way to the professor looking like she expected Fulpin
to down her as soon as she got there. When that didn’t happen she sighed a
visibly.

“You there what’s your name?”

Professor Fulpin pointed at a cute brunette in the front row.

“Kristin.”

Came the answer from a smooth and pleasurable voice.

“Would you be so kind and come up here and stand next to Stephanie?”

The young woman put her pen and paper to the side and made her way to the TA.
She was an average sized girl, she still had that layer of fat in her face that
most people loose when they reach twenty, making her look cute. A lean body,
sort of soft and nicely curved equipped with a perky set of breasts and a full
round ass that swayed seductively as she walked.

Kristin stopped next to the TA and gave the professor a confused look. She was
about an inch taller than Stephanie at 5’7 and probably 15-20 pounds heavier
with her 145 pounds.

“Stephanie is going to show you a couple of skills that comes in handy when
swallowing large things, especially if they are unwilling.”

The professor said and turned towards Stephanie and Kristin.

“Now Stephanie would you please take Kristin’s hand in your mouth?”

Kristin looked a little scared but offered Stephanie her hand, who took it and
plunged it down her throat, stopping at Kristin’s elbow. Kristin’s lower arm
made Stephanie’s throat bulge and the professor resumed speaking.

“Now as you can see Stephanie has no trouble breathing as she has learned to
breathe with food in her throat. This skill is essential, since swallowing most
large meals take time and the first times it can take a very long time.”

“Now with a large meal in your stomach you’ll be pretty eye catching and it is
cumbersome to get around. Should you just swallow a person, it isn’t even sure
that you’ll fit through the door. This is why Stephanie is going to show us
that you can squeeze your meal tight and it will take up less space, this is
something that not only comes with practice but also develops with your body as
it learns to handle large meals. It is also a matter of technique.”

“As you see Stephanie’s throat is bulging and looking rather deformed, please
show us what you can do about that Steph.”

“Whoa! It’s so tight!”

Kristine yelped as Stephanie’s throat almost returned to normal, even though
Kristine’s are was still in it.

“Kristine is right, it is tight, something that is useful when keeping
struggling meals in place. It is a very effective measure to prevent your meals
from escaping. Stephanie would you please swallow Kristine?”

Kristine said something, but it was muffled as her head quickly disappeared
down Stephanie’s throat. Stephanie held Kristin’s remaining arm to her side and
continued to gobble up the young beauty. When she reached Kristin’s waist she
lifted the girl of the ground so that Kristin’s legs pointed at the ceiling.
Assisted by gravity Stephanie had no problem finishing Kristin off.

“Very well done Steph. Now students take a look at Stephanie’s tummy.”

Stephanie pulled up her shirt and showed of her tight bulging tummy. It was
large, but not a full grown person in there kind of large, she looked several
months pregnant, but not more than that.

“Now Stephanie is rather good at this, you should be happy if you can get away
with looking nine months pregnant when you have practiced this as much as she
has. As you understand it is a very useful skill, people don’t notice a
pregnant woman but if someone looked 12 months pregnant with triplets, then
they would soon be on the front page of the local newspaper.”

“Well keeping people in you belly brings us to another skill you have to learn
before I can let you swallow each other, namely swallowing air. The person in
your belly needs air so you have to swallow some every now and then, and it is
equally important that you burp out the old air in there. The person in your
stomach doesn’t just need oxygen, he/she also can’t tolerate too high
concentrations of carbon dioxide. If the carbon dioxide levels gets too high
the oxygen atoms won’t be able to bond to the hem-groups in the blood and the
person in your stomach will slowly suffocate, regardless of how much oxygen you
give them.”

“Any questions?”

A few hands came into the air and the professor pointed at a curly redhead with
a sexy palette of freckles.

“Yes you said that we probably wouldn’t get as good as Stephanie at hiding our
meals during this class, but not that we couldn’t become as good or even better
as we continued practicing after this course. So my question is how small a
bulge can a full grown person become?”

A sly grin spread across the professor’s face as she turned to Stephanie.

“Well I guess I could show you.”

Stephanie only managed a short yelp before she disappeared down the professor’s
throat. The professor used her skills so Stephanie hardly showed as she
travelled down the professor’s gullet. When she settled into Professor Fulpin’s
stomach a few seconds later there was no bulge at all in the professor’s
stomach to tell of her presence.

“So does that answer your question?”

Pr. Fulpin said as she gently rubbed her stomach.

“I now have two full grown people in here and there is no bulge at all.”

A mumbling “Cool” spread across the classroom.

“I agree with most in here, that is cool, and yes it was the answer I was
looking for.”

Said the now smiling redhead as she stared at the professor in shock and
disbelief.

“Any more questions?”

Fulpin asked the class.
Again several hands appeared and the professor motioned for a little girl with
short hair dyed in some sort of purple and piercings in both her ears and nose.
Regardless of the style, which usually comes with an attitude problem, she
looked like a really sweet girl.

“Well first the TA ate Kristin and now you are the TA, meaning that both of
them are in your digestive tract. You haven’t said anything about digestion?!”

“Oh they are fine in there.”

The professor said and patted her tummy.

“There are a few things you can do. The first one being doing nothing, and thus
leaving your stomach to do what it is designed to do. When you can hide your
meal sufficiently, that is usually a good option, since you don’t have to worry
about anything.”

“Secondly you can try and prevent digestion. That is slowing it down. If you
are as good as me or a few of the girls in my research team, then you can
completely stop the digestion process. Something that might be good should you
want to keep a friend in your stomach.”

She once again stroked the surface of her tummy.

“This is what I’ve done now, so I could keep Stephanie in here as long as I
wanted without hurting her. However I don’t think she can stop her digestion
tract, so sooner or later she would end up digesting Kristin.”

The professor gave the students a look of mixed emotions.

“I guess I should let them out soon, but you will come to learn that having
someone in your stomach is a very nice and special feeling indeed.”

She paused and smiled mischievously.

“I guess I’ll keep them just a little while longer.”

She straightened her pose before she continued.

“The third thing you can do is to speed up the digestion process. This is as
you understand very useful, especially if you can’t hide your meal properly.”

“Slowing your digestion can be achieved with a few different techniques and a
few different substances. Yes there are a few different pills so far that can
help you as well as a couple of potions. All these do concentrate on preventing
the stomach to do what it is made to do. Slowing the digestion process after
the meal has been passed into the intestines seems a bit pointless, but there
are those who study that too, should the need arise.”

“Speeding the digestion can be accomplished in lots of ways, and that is also
why the diversity of pills and potions that does this is much greater that
those that slows it.”

The professor starts a little PowerPoint presentation. Mainly it shows cut view
of a woman so that you can see her whole digestive tract.

“Firstly you can stimulate the stomach, so that it produces more gastric juices
and more effective gastric juices. Don’t underestimate the churning of the
stomach, the larger the surface, the more of the meal comes into contact with
and can thus react with the gastric juices. It is therefore essential that your
stomach is effective at ripping your meal apart. Maybe I should say
pulverizing, because in the long end that’s basically what it is trying to
do.”

“The book takes up several ways to achieve this, a couple of massage techniques
and a more concentration based technique that is meant to control your inner
muscles and organs. To say the least, this is much harder than any massage.
There are of course several other techniques that are not covered by the book,
and I won’t go into them. This course is just covering what is in the book. I
might start a continuation course to this one, but currently there are none.”

“Then as the meal has been reduced to a nutritious soup there are several ways
to higher the efficiency of the continuing break down of the meal and the
absorption process, not to mention the dehydration process. The book covers a
few tricks, and I might take up a couple more, but the ones I take up in
addition to those in the book won’t be on any tests. It is just going to be for
those who wants too improve a little bit more.”

“I almost forgot, you can if you like just hurry the progress of the meal
through your intestines, this will give you diarrhoea, sometimes even a lumpy
case of such since your meal isn’t digested. It can be useful at times.
Fortunately I don’t have to use this solution any more.”

“The only drawback as I see it with speeding up digestion is that it usually
gets quite noisy.”

“Any questions?”

A black haired suntanned girl waved her hand vigorously. She was the only one
holding her hand up so the professor addressed her.

“Do you have a problem with a fly, or do you have a question?”

Professor Fulpin displayed that she too was equipped with the awful sense of
humour most professors have.

“I don’t remember if I heard it or read it somewhere in the book. But what is
power digest?”

“Power digest, is a rather loose term. As you get by its name it is about speed
up digestion. Generally if digestion takes place at such a speed that you can
see the process as it occur, then it is considered power digestion. As you see
the definition is rather loose, there is no lower end and the upper end is
diffuse, maybe digestion within an hour could still be considered power
digestion, I don’t know.”

“There have been a few power digest competitions among the girls in my research
team, I never stayed around to watch, but I think they measures the time it
took from first part of the meal entering the mouth until the last of the meal
exited at the other end. In other words a rather gross scene to behold, but I
guess drunken people can come up with all sorts of weird and gross things, even
young researchers.”

The professor finished talking and shut down the computer. When she looked up
at the class again she saw a waving hand.

“Yes?”

“Could you please show us some power digestion?”

“Show you? For that I’d need someone to digest.”

“Well don’t you all ready have two in there?”

“If you want to see power digestion I’ll be happy to show the class if you’d
come down here and be my meal, but I’m not digesting Stephanie and Kristin!”

The professor calmed down again.

“Besides, you’d not see much of it anyway, since I won’t take a crap here all
you’d notice would be my belly rumbling a little. No, the effectful part would
be hiding the meal.”

Professor Fulpin looked down at her tummy and poked it slightly.

“Stephanie I’m going to relax my stomach so that you should show again. I need
you to wiggle a little so that my stomach loosens up a bit and the bulge
becomes bigger.”

Stephanie did wiggle more than just a little, she knew the professor was asking
her to trash about as much as she could, and she did. Meanwhile the professor
tried to relax her stomach as much as possible, so that the bulge should get as
large as possible. The result however wasn’t great, a bulge did appear, but it
could probably only be seen by the girls on the first row.

“Ehh. Maybe I should let the TA’s show you this instead. It seems my body
prefers to keep my meals in check. But those of you who can see the little
bulge I got, watch now.”

And instantly the bulge disappeared.

The professor took a bottle of orange coloured liquid of her desk and held it
up.

“As you see this liquid is orange, it is actually colourless, but since it is
so important we have decided to colour it. It is what we will use in this class
to regurgitate our meals. If you see an orange liquid in here it should be this
kind of liquid. I don’t want to catch anyone bringing other orange liquids into
my class is that clear? And I don’t want to see any practical jokes with this
liquid, because the consequences could be dire.”

She took a few mouthfuls of the liquid and in seconds she was bringing
Stephanie back up her throat. Stephanie appeared head first and looked to be
alright.

The professor bent over and let Stephanie slid out of her mouth as soon as she
had touched the floor.

Wet and slimy Stephanie got to her feet and took the bottle of orange liquid
that she was handed by the professor. She mimicked the movements Pr. Fulpin had
just displayed and soon Kristin was lying on the floor.

“Come Kristin, there are showers back here.”

And with that the TA and Kristin walked out of the classroom to get themselves
showered off.
112.title: Lesson 2

choices: Lesson three.
The weekend.
1122.content:
“I will try to fit in a practice session at the end of each lesson, so that you can benefit from the TA’s and my help.”

The TA’s spread out across the room carrying several bags each with them while the professor continued.

“It is very important that you first manage to repress your gag reflex. I hope you all practiced at home, but if you still don’t feel comfortable with the spoon, I suggest that you repeat what we did last time.”

“If you are somewhat comfortable with the spoon, then give it to your partner and let her handle it. This is much harder, but if you get the hang of it, it won’t matter what is shoved down your throat. Which is the reason as to why we practice this first, it is hard to get anywhere with vore if you keep gagging on everything.”

“In other words practice this as much as you can. You won’t get anywhere unless you spend some serious time with this at home. When you are able to keep from gagging the TA’s will instruct you as how to proceed. As you can see they have brought a lot of fruit with them in all sizes.”

The Ta’s held up a couple of different fruits differing from plums too large watermelons.

“You will notice that you have to practice stretching your mouth and throat, so begin with small things and move to larger things as you make progress. You don’t have to throw the fruit back up. I don’t think anyone wants to eat it once it’s been in your stomach. Consider it a free meal.”

The students waited until the professor finally got quiet before they started. Most had tried keeping their gagging at bay at home with mixed results. Many hadn’t practiced at all and it showed, they still had problems with the spoon.

But there were others who had showed good progress already during the last session. Sarah, Melissa and Laura and a few others had been showing good progress last time, but because they did they hadn’t practiced much at home. Never the less they were ready to let their partners handle the spoon for them and soon had no problems with that either.

More interesting though were some of the girls who had been practicing a lot at home and in the two days since the last lesson had made serious progress. Most noticeable were Samantha, Sally and Gia.

Samantha had always been a bitch and liked pushing people around. So now that vore presented itself she had every intention of becoming good at it. With an object in her mouth to practicing at not gagging she had read as much as she could from the book and was half way through it. She was among the first ones to try the fruits today.

Gia a little exotic beauty, she has black healthy hair both straight and thick and it comes down below her shoulders. Her naturally dark skin tone looks like the perfect tan and she has a great body to match.

At the last lesson she got a few remarks that she didn’t like. She’s the smallest girls in class only 4’3” and rather svelte, so some girls said that they could probably eat her without much practicing. They had been smacking and licking their lips and patting their tummies. This had made Gia determined to practice a lot, she was not going to become someone’s snack without a fight.

Sally the girl who last time had been the last one to manage anything wasn’t quite as small as Gia but still felt awfully small, not to mention humiliated after really having been last with everything last time. She had actually skipped a few lessons to practice and she hadn’t seen any of her friends since last time.

When she had gotten home that day the first thing she did was to get one of her spoons she used for making chocolate milk, it sort of looks like a teaspoon with a really long shaft. Then she had spent most of the evening sitting in front of her toilet shoving the spoon in and out of her throat.

In fact the clock had become two in the morning before she went to bed. This lead to that she missed her first class but before she went to her second she tried the spoon move again and she hadn’t much problem with it any more.

During her breaks in school that day she studied what the next thing was. Thus she bought a few different sized edible things before she got home that day. She was eager to see if she was ready to start stretching her mouth and throat.

The first thing she tried was a pickle, it took a while for her to feel comfortable with it in her throat, something she wanted too before she swallowed it. She then took an apple. This was much more difficult. Her throat slowly stretched to accommodate the fruit.

What she was most surprised about was that she didn’t have any trouble breathing with the apple in her throat. She guessed the professor had mentioned being able to breathe as something essential because breathing is essential, and not because it was something she students would have to learn.

After the first apple she had a couple more, and after she had downed her sixth apple she had no problem with her gagging reflex any more.

She considered trying an orange but she spat it out after just a few minutes and decided that she’d rather spend some time stretching her mouth, her throat could wait until tomorrow. So she picked up the largest thing she bought. It was a yellow melon, bad with names she didn’t care what its correct name was, it was going to help her stretch her mouth and the damn thing weighed at least six pounds.

After consulting the book several times it took her a good ten minutes of pushing and grunting before she got the bloody thing into her mouth, and another fifteen before her lips finally closed behind it. She decided to try and read a little from the book, but she eventually wound up on her bed and watched a little bit of TV before she fell asleep. As she succumbed to her tiredness she still had the melon in her mouth.

When she woke up she found that the melon was gone, she did a quick search of the room and with a smile she got to the conclusion that she must have swallowed it during her sleep. Giggling like the school girl she is she got ready for school and her second lesson of vore.

So now that it was time for practice she was the first one to call a TA. With a bit of nagging she got Julianne to let her start with a melon that looked much like the one she had practiced on last night.

Jolly she returned to her seat with the golden fruit like it was some sort of treasure. It didn’t take long to get her practicing companion Tiffany to help her.

Tiffany just stared at Sally as she returned with the large fruit.

“You are kidding, you can’t start with that!”

“Sure I can and I need your help to push it down.”

“Well don’t blame me if something goes wrong.”

Tiffany said. She was intrigued as to why Sally sounded so sure of herself. Her eyes almost popped out of their sockets when she saw what Sally did next.

Rubbing her jaws Sally’s mouth popped open and she stuffed half of the melon into her mouth. Then Sally grabbed one of Tiffany’s hands and put it on the still free end of the melon.

Tiffany snapped out of her trance and started pushing. It didn’t work very well because Sally was still standing up. So Tiffany got an idea.

“Sally sit down!”

Sally did as she was told and Tiffany stood in front of her, or more appropriate would probably be calling it standing over Sally’s lap, since Sally’s thighs were under her.

Tiffany then forced Sally’s head against the back of the seat as she forcefully tried to cram the fruit into Sally. Because Sally couldn’t give the fruit had no option but to slowly disappear down Sally’s throat.

“Haha! It’s working I knew it!”

Tiffany exclaimed almost as happy as Sally about the progress.

Soon the whole melon has inside and Tiffany wondered whether she should continue pushing or not. She tried the not pushing option first and quickly came to the conclusion that Sally still needed her help. Not wanting both her arms in there Tiffany rolled up her right arm sleeve and resumed the pushing, just using her right hand this time.

Tiffany was amazed that Sally could do this. Slowly her hand disappeared from view as she shoved the melon down Sally’s throat. And eventually her elbow was in Sally’s mouth too. Then with a wet plop the resistance went away and she almost toppled over as the melon finally entered Sally’s stomach.

“Eww.”

Tiffany said as she felt her fingers inside Sally’s stomach and her arm enveloped in Sally’s warm and wet throat. She slowly pulled her arm back out and felt Sally’s tongue taste as much of her as it could.

“Mmm, you’re yummy.”

Sally said when Tiffany pulled her hand out of Sally’s mouth.

“Thanks, I guess.”

Tiffany smiled back.

“Would you mind helping me with another one?”

Sally asked, but before she got any answer Tiffany was already halfway to Julianne and shouted at the poor TA.

“Give me a melon dammit! I want it yesterday!”

“Sure, just calm down, the melons ain’t gonna run away you know.”

Julianne said and gave the girl what she wanted.

“Open wide”

Tiffany teased as she came back to Sally with another yellow melon. Sally playing the good girl did as she was told and was soon feeling her mouth and throat stretching once more.

This melon went down a little bit easier, it might have had to do with Tiffany pushing harder this time, but it still took quite a while. And Tiffany was pulling her arm back out of Sally’s mouth when the bell rang.

“See you Monday”

Sally said. As she and Tiffany went their separate ways.

Sally was rather pleased with today’s practice, she had been the only one using melons and she had made up her mind, she was going to sleep with a melon in her mouth until next lesson which would be on Monday, leaving her the whole weekend to practice.
1122.title: Practice

choices: Meghan meets Sally.
Something else.
11221.content:
Monday morning meant it was time for the third lesson of vore 101 and a little surprise for the students. The professor was early and waiting for them as the first students arrived to take their seats. So it was with some nervousness that the rows got filled today, luckily it didn’t seem like she was going to start ahead of time.

One early student seemed pleased to find the professor already here though. She had hoped to get hold of the professor before the class started so this was a perfect opportunity.

“Excuse me professor Fulpin?”

The young blond beauty said as she approached the professor.

“Yes?”

Came the answer as the professor noticed the rather long athletic student that approached her.

“My name is Meghan, I’m new here and I was told to ask you personally. The thing is that I already know vore and would like to make some sort of test so that I won’t have to come here and listen to something I already know.”

A bit perplexed the professor took a close look at the young girl standing before her in a pair of beige hotpants and a short tanktop, thus leaving a muscular stomach free for anyone to see. Like most athletic girls she has a behind to die for and breast that might be a bit on the small side, but in return are firm and perky.

“You already know vore? Well if you do then I see how this class could be rather boring, seeing as it is designed for those that have never heard of vore before. There’s still about fifteen minutes before class starts, so can you tell me a little about yourself and maybe more importantly how you’ve come to know vore. I will try to come up with a test in the meantime to test the skills needed for this class.”

Happy to hear this Meghan broke into a smile.

“Well I just moved here, I think you know my mother professor Hawthorn. They decided that it would be better if both your and her research teams were at the same university. That way you could work together more closely and they hoped that any pride loss for loosing a discovery to the other would go away seeing as you now work for the same university.”

“Yes I know professor Hawthorn. We have been working together on several occasions, that was why we were chosen to try this. If it works well, then there will probably come another team in 2-3 years. I had forgotten Hawthorn would come here now. I guess time really does fly. Your mother and I have gotten along very well in the past. I didn’t know she had a daughter though.”

“She has three actually, though it may take a while before you get to meet any of my sisters.”

“How come?”

“My older sister is done with college and unfortunately doesn’t even live in this town, I guess I wont see her very often now. And my younger sister is only fifteen, so you’ll probably meet her when its time for her to go to college.”

“So how come your mother haven’t given you these grades already?”

“Well she didn’t hold any vore classes on her old school. She concentrated on research and got her PhD hungry students from other universities. As you probably know she’s not going to be holding any classes here either. Somehow I think that the students would rather be eaten by you anyway, you look great. My mother looks good for her age too, but she’s still fifty, if you know what I mean. And you’re the one with the experience at handling students.”

“Well thank you! I guess she won’t cheat me on any meals then.”

The professor chuckled and licked her lips.

“Back to vore. My mother taught all of us sisters vore at an early age, I wasn’t even five years old the first time I swallowed my older sister, mom supervised the whole event. Mom continued to teach us stuff as we learned more. Now we have all reached the point that mom often ask us to help her try something, and we always have had full access to her work, meaning that I think we all know more about vore than even the researchers in your team.”

“Growing up with vore has made us a bit different than other girls, which is one of the reasons mom likes to study new theories on us. Most that learn vore do so after they have reached adulthood, often after they have stopped growing. Even so the body adapts, changing a little with each meal and the overall change over a period of time can be enormous. The thing that’s different with me and my sisters is that because we grew up with vore our bodies were still forming when vore made its mark on us, meaning that our bodies are adapted to handle vore like none my mother has ever seen.”

Meghan paused for a moment. And the professor raised an eyebrow interested in what this could mean.

“Like I said, my older sister was my first meal, luckily she and I have always liked each other, and we have been the best of friends for as long as I can remember. I believe mom is as glad at this as me and my sister, otherwise one would undoubtedly have digested the other long ago.”

“Yes that would have been my worry with teaching children vore.”

“As it is me and my older sister have always looked out for each other and have also enjoyed eating each other. Do you have any idea how many times two playful children can eat one another in a day?”

“I can imagine.”

The professor chuckled.

“Well then I have to give you some sort of test before I can sign any paper. I’m also a bit interested in seeing what you can do.”

The professor thinks for a while before she walks off to a bag near the wall and picks up a large water melon. Returning to Meghan she hands her the melon.

“How about you swallow this, and keep it in your stomach until it is time for practice at the end of the lesson. Keep in unharmed because keeping your digestion tract at bay is one of the skills my students must have. Frankly it makes practicing on people all the much easier and I want to see you swallow students later.”

“Ok, no digestion it is.”

Meghan easily pop the melon into her mouth and shows the professor that she knows how to hide a meal, because once the melon is inside her mouth isn’t stretched at all, her cheeks doesn’t even bulge. And as she swallows the melon it makes neither a bulge in her throat or her torso.

“I’ll keep it safe for you.”

Meghan said and patted her flat tummy.

“Should I come down here when it’s time for practicing?”

“Do that.”

The professor said and smiled. Meghan took a seat near a walkway a few rows up.

After listening to Fulpin telling her stuff she already knows for an hour and a half, Meghan is glad when the professor tells them that it is time for practice.

The TA’s take over monitoring and guiding the girls practicing and Meghan comes up to the professor as they agreed she would.

Without the help of any potion Meghan brings the melon back up and spits it out into her hands and gives it to the impressed professor.

“Here you are. See it’s not even slightly burnt and there is no pressure damage from my stomach either.”

Meghan says excited at the aspect of swallowing some people.

“Very good. Very good indeed.”

Fulpin says and puts the melon away.

“Now you said you said that you had some talent. I would like to see what you can do, but keep the digestion off, I’m foremost interested in seeing you swallow people.”

“Because we are an odd number I don’t have any partner for you, but it sounded like you’d prefer swallowing more than one anyway. And since you’d pass the class we would have an odd number anyway once you’ve proven what you can do had we had a partner for you.”

“Don’t worry if I know anything, it is vore. I would have been more nervous had it been a math test or so. So who’s on the menu?”

“Well let’s get some volunteers and you can choose whom to swallow.”

The professor turned to the girls at the front rows.

“Could you girls please come down here, Meghan says she already knows enough to pass this class and I want to give her an opportunity to do so. It would be really tiresome to force someone to listen to things they already know inside and out, not to mention being in Meghan’s place and be the one listening.”

Most of the girls had stopped their practicing and listened to the professor.

“So would you please come down here and let Meghan show us what she can do, she has already proven that she can hold of digestion, so don’t worry about that.”

All the girls that had been listening to the professor were intrigued. So about thirty girls made their way down and stood in a single group in front of Meghan and the professor.

“Go ahead Meghan take who ever you like.”

But Meghan hesitated and asked the girls.

“Ehh… are you going to keep your clothes on?”

“Yes why should we take them off?”

“Because even though there are no gastric juices in there.”

Meghan poked her stomach.

“It is still awfully wet.”

The professor answered in the girls place.

“Everyone in the class has been asked to bring extra clothes along to use in the eventuality that they should get swallowed. So anyone not having clothes with them have only themselves to blame. But they could probably borrow clothes from a friend who hasn’t got swallowed anyway so there is no problem.”

“Ok then.”

Meghan said and approached the group of young ladies. She had proved earlier that she could hide her meals, but this was something special to behold. Meghan looks like she is going to give Kristine a kiss, but without making Meghan’s mouth bulge Kristine’s head disappear in between her full lips. Meghan easily sucks in the rest of Kristine and swallows her in one go. Kristine like the melon earlier doesn’t even make a lump in Meghan’s neck as she travels into her sexy athletic stomach.

The next girl vanishes just as easily, this time it is Felicia’s turn. Meghan picked her up off the floor and crammed her straight down her gullet.

Meghan kept at it quickly wolfing down one girl after another, obviously enjoying herself.

When the fifth girl entered her stomach and is still was as flat as ever, the gathered girls around Meghan began to back away.

This only made Meghan speed up her efforts and two minutes later she and professor Fulpin were the only ones left at the front of the classroom.

The professor simply stared, sure she too could manage to get that many girls into her stomach, but they only made a small bulge in Meghan’s stomach. So she just looked on dumbstruck as Meghan decided to move up to the girls who were practicing with one another.

The scene that had played out at the front of the classroom had gone completely unnoticed by the rest of the class. So Meghan made her way through the rest of the students unhindered, if someone said something or noticed what she was doing then they were the next one to travel down her throat.

She had managed to put three fourths of the class into her stomach before the rest finally noticed that it had become rather quiet in the classroom.

A few shrieks brought every ones attention and soon the girls were stumbling over each other to get away from Meghan. She however skilfully used the fact that no one wanted to be close to her and had soon herded the remaining girls into one on the upper corners of the room, far away from any door. Naturally she had swallowed who ever got within her reach as she did so, thus there wasn’t all that many girls left in the corner when she closed in on them.

Half a minute later she was alone in the corner and turned around to walk back down to the professor. She walked down the steps with a spring in her step. Even though she had swallowed the whole class she didn’t look more than nine months pregnant.

She saw that the TA’s had gathered along the wall further down the walkway she was using. They looked at her with fear and awe as she casually walked towards them.

When she got close to them they started to back away from her, she had previously shown no interest in them, she hadn’t even looked at them as she walked towards the front of the room. But now she took a few quick steps and caught up with them. Three loud swallows followed and Meghan was alone in the large classroom with the professor.

“Mmm, that was wonderful! I seldom get to eat more than one and I have never gorged myself like this.”

Meghan moaned as she stopped in front of professor Fulpin.

“Here you take the time.”

Megan excitedly said and handed the professor her digital watch.

“I have never eaten this much, so it might take a while to digest. My guess is 73 seconds. Ready?”

Meghan said and put her hands on her stomach.

“NO! NO! STOP!”

Fulpin yelled at her.

“Don’t you digest any of them!”

“Throw them up! I don’t want all my students turned to shit!

Meghan giggled.

“I was just kidding with you.”

The professor sighed loudly and then joined in the giggling.

“Ok it was a little funny, I give you that.”

“So is there anything but throwing them back up I have to do to pass your class?”

“No I believe there is no need to test your skills any further, just throw them up and I’ll make sure you get the highest possible grade.”

“Thanks! Ehh…where do you want them? Here on the floor?”

“I guess that will have to do, we only have seven showers in the back, but I guess the sooner they get out of there the sooner they will be showered and dressed.”

The professor said and pointed at Meghan’s large tummy.

Meghan walked off to one wall and started bringing the girls back up. She spat them out four or five at a time and backed away so that they wouldn’t just end up in a big pile and be unable to move. Soon the classroom was filled with chatter. Everyone seemed to have something to say.

When Meghan reached the wall on the other side of the room she stopped bringing more girls up and waited for the ones that were out to get themselves together and out of her way. She then repeated what she did before. All in all she had to cross the room three times before all the girls were out.

The TA’s gathered behind the professor all quite taken by the experience. Only Julianne seemed to be able to keep from staring at Meghan. She on the other hand had a bulging belly almost as big as Meghan’s was moments ago. This the professor noticed.

“Julianne don’t you have some throwing up to do?”

“Aww, they feel so good in there.”

Julianne pouted her lips and rubbed her tummy.

The professor gave her an orange potion.

“I don’t care. Just get them out of there now.”

Julianne drank the whole bottle and was soon bending over as the first girl emerged from her mouth. She was soon followed by a second and then a third. The girls gave Julianne a couple of annoyed looks and then ran off to get their clothes and towels to stand in the forming shower line. After they had gone the professor spoke again.

“Why did you swallow them?”

“The first one shoved her elbow in my face so I sort off took my revenge on her. The second one managed to get her hand into my mouth, I just helped her the rest of the way.”

Julianne giggled.

“I swallowed the third one because the two already in my stomach felt so good and I thought they could do with some company.”

“I bet you did.”

Fulpin snickered.

“Dry yourselves off and keep an eye on the students. One never knows when one has a nervous breakdown.“

The TA’s had not expected to be swallowed and thus hadn’t brought clothes to the classroom, they did however always keep a spare set of clothes in their locker in case they would need it. They would have to wait till the class was over and the students had got out of there before they could go get them though.
11221.title: Meghan

choices: Sally's place.
Something else.
112211.content:
After letting everyone out Meghan went up and took a seat. Everyone stayed clear of her as she walked pass them.

She hadn’t been seated very long when a cute little girl stopped a few feet away from her. The young woman was Sally, and she looked at Meghan in fear. Sally’s problem was that Meghan had just taken a seat at random and had chosen the seat next to where she had her belongings.

Meghan looked up at her and smiled at the still wet girl, who had obviously been one of the first to get showered off.

“What’s the matter? I don’t bite.”

Meghan said giggling.
She didn’t get any response from Sally though, who just kept staring at her.

“Um…Am I in your seat?”

“Ehh…no. No you are not. My seat is the one on your left.”

“So why don’t you come and sit down then?”

Meghan said and patted Sally’s seat.

Sally looked both confused and terrified as she slowly walked closer to Meghan, who stood up so that Sally could get past her.

Sally slowed down once more though and came to a halt just out of Meghan’s reach.

“Come here, I’m not that bad once you get to know me.”

Sally finally got the courage to get past Meghan and they both sat down in their seats.

Sally shoved her used clothes and towel into her bag and started gathering her notes.

“Calm down.”

Meghan tried to make her relax.

“What’s your name? I’m Meghan.”

She said and held out her hand. Sally stopped and looked at the outstretched limb, then she looked up at Meghan and forced a smile on her face. She shakingly took Meghan’s hand and shook it a little.

“Sally.”

“Nice to meet you Sally, do you mind if I sit here and talk with you? We’re not supposed to leave the classroom until class is over, and somehow I sense that there’s not going to happen all that much before the bell rings.”

“It’s a free country.”

Was the best Sally could manage.

“I know that, but forcing once presence on others isn’t the best way to make friends.”

“Friends?!” Sally thought to herself.

This word seemed to break through her wall of fear. Meghan really seemed like a nice girl, she could always do with another friend, and somehow it felt less likely to get eaten by Meghan if she called you friend.

“Please stay. I…I guess my first meeting with you wasn’t as pleasant as I would have liked it to be.”

Sally finally said, she only paused for a second before she added.

“Why did you eat everyone?”

“Well the professor wanted to see what I could do so first I swallowed the volunteers, I wasn’t full, and you’ll come to know that eating people is really nice. So when the professor didn’t tell me to stop I continued and then all of a sudden there was no one left to eat but the professor. I didn’t want to push my luck so I didn’t try. I believe the professor can eat me any time she wants to, I might have a big gut and appetite, but I’m not so sure my swallowing techniques are as good as hers. I’ve learnt everything I know from mom and her research team, and they have mostly been concentrating on getting large amounts into the digestive system and through it.”

“Your mom?”

“Oh, I never told you that professor Hawthorn is my mom did I? She’s a professor in vore just like Professor Fulpin. She just got her research team moved to this university and managed to transfer me to this school so that I could move with her. I prefer living at home to getting crammed into a little dorm, besides I didn’t have many friends back home anyway. All my old friends moved to different collages that the local one and I guess I never made many new ones.”

“I see how you could be so good at vore if your mom’s a professor in it. That is awesome! I wish I had a mom like that.”

“Yeah it is cool, she gives me and my sisters free access to her work too, and that’s really cool. I hope to become a professor like her one day, the problem is that I have to learn a lot off math and chemistry though, foremost organic and biochemistry.”

Meghan said as she crooked an eyebrow.

“Yeah I guess you need to know what happens to be able to improve it.”

Sally mused.

“Hehe. Enough about me. I was busy eating people in the practice session, what have you done so far?”

“We started with a long spoon and tired to overcome our gag reflex, most of us managed that last week so today most tried to swallow objects to stretch their throats. Most tried apples and pears and other fruits, some used oranges, and a few of us used melons.”

“By the way you said it I take it that you were among the ones using melons.”

Meghan smiled.

“I could teach you a few tricks if you want too.”

“You would? I’d love that!”

Sally said showing honest joy. Then Meghan continued.

“So should we meet after school, I still have a biochemistry class to go to.”

“Sure where should me meet? We can be at my place.”

“That’s fine by me. You don’t have any more classes today?”

“No so I’ll go home and study until you get there.”

Sally wrote down a few scribblings, tore the paper off and handed it to Meghan.

“Can you read that?”

“You write like a machine, there’s no way I can get this description wrong.”

Meghan giggled.

“I’ll be there at four, is that ok with you?”

“See you at four.”

With that Meghan went up to the seat where she had left her bag earlier. She saw that there were still lots of girls who hadn’t made it to the shower yet. Then the bell rang and professor Fulpin let the students go.
112211.title: Meghan meets Sally.

choices: Meghan escapes.
Meghan is too tired from all the work.
1122111.content:
“Hi! Please come in!”

Sally said as she greeted Meghan and stepped aside to let her in. Sally didn’t think of it before but now it was clear, Meghan with her 5’10” was a full head taller than little Sally and now that Sally stood in her bare feet and Meghan still had her shoes on, she felt really small.

A little bit of small talk followed as the girls settled in Sally’s couch. Sally had a small apartment it was basically just a square room large enough to fit a bed, a couch with a small table in front of it, and a desk at one end into it. She had of course a bookcase at one wall for her books and a chest of drawers upon which she had placed a small 14 inch colour TV. Out of the square room a corner had been taken to make room for a bathroom and beside it a waist high bench stretched out a bit to make the kitchen area look somewhat like a room.

During their talk Meghan got to know that Sally usually hung out with Sarah and Melissa, who both were quite a bit bigger than Sally, both a bit taller and a little on the plump side.
She was also told that they had had it much easier than Sally and were also practicing on melons even though they hadn’t practiced anywhere as much as she had.

“So what is the largest thing you’ve tried so far?”

Sally went to the kitchen and took out a 20 pound watermelon.

“I almost got this into my mouth last night.”

“So how did you approach it? Did you just cram the thing into your mouth and using the pressure to make your mouth stretch?”

Meghan asked.

“Well yeah, basically that’s it I guess.”

“Well put it away and I’ll try to help you stretch that mouth.”

Sally put the melon back in the fridge and returned to the couch.

“So what do you want me to do?”

“Just sit down straight and try to relax, I’ll do the rest for now.”

So Sally sat back down and made herself comfortable and Meghan seated herself in Sally’s lap so that they were facing each other.

“Now open wide.”

Meghan demanded and shoved her hands into Sally’s mouth instantly dislocating her jaw.

Sally unable to speak anything coherent as long as Meghan was doing her stuff decided that she could just as well try to enjoy the sensations and Meghan’s taste whish she realised was very good. Meghan on the other hand didn’t find talking all that fun when she didn’t get any response, so she just kept at what she was doing.

After half an hour Meghan had both her forearms into Sally’s mouth sideways and massaged, pulled and rubbed as she slowly stretched Sally’s mouth wider and wider.

“It is much easier to swallow something that isn’t stretching you to the max, so you should try to stretch it as wide as you can.”

After a while Meghan had her forearms spread the width of her own shoulders, sort of making Sally’s mouth look like a square with the side length of one of Meghan’s forearms.

“Now that melon of yours shouldn’t be a problem, but I have only stretched your mouth. Should I stretch your throat some too?”

Sally said something incoherent and nicked her approval.

Meghan took her arms back out and let Sally’s mouth relax some as she instead shoved her hands down Sally’s throat. Meghan squeezed and pushed and pulled and massaged the opening, slowly stretching it wider and wider. As she did she also moved her hands further and further down Sally’s throat.

Sally was amazed at the transformation she was going through and that Meghan never seemed to tire. She closed her eyes and let Meghan keep at it for as long as she wanted.

After a while Sally felt something tickling her mouth and it quickly moved into her throat. When she opened her mouth she saw that Meghan had shoved her head and shoulders in after her arms and that her breasts were just outside Sally’s mouth.

Sally could feel that Meghan had stretched her throat wide all the way to her stomach and was now starting to stretching it even wider, this time beginning at the lower end of Sally’s throat and going upwards.

As she started to stretch Sally’s throat really wide at the bottom of her throat, Meghan pulled in more of her upper body so that her head was at the opening of Sally’s stomach.

Sally was now holding Meghan’s waist in her mouth, and because she was holding her mouth upwards to make the path to her stomach straight, Meghan was more or less standing up in the sofa, bending down into Sally’s throat.

Then something happened. Meghan lost her grip on the sides of Sally’s throat and she sort of fell into Sally’s stomach. Because she had done such a good job stretching Sally and because Sally was so relaxed her hips and thighs quickly went into Sally’s throat. The sudden movements made Sally swallow reflex ably and thus without thinking of what she did she swallowed the rest of Meghan.

“Throw me up!”

Meghan shouted from where she was, curled up in Sally’s stomach. Sally hadn’t learned yet to hold her digestion at bay so all the while Meghan had been working in Sally’s throat juices had accumulated, waiting for the meal to arrive. Meghan even when she had been stretching the lower end of Sally’s throat had been out of reach for the acids and enzymes. But now she was covered in them.

“How? I don’t have any orange potions!”

“Ohh! Well hang on then! I’ll have to force my way out!”
1122111.title: Sally’s place.

choices: Wednesday’s class.
Something else.
11221111.content:
Meghan sensed which way was up and down. She then placed her feet under her and more or less stood back up Sally’s throat. Sally found that even though the opening to her stomach was now very stretchable once a meal was inside the stomach unless controlled to do otherwise it would do its best at keeping the meal inside. So when Meghan forced it open from the inside it was actually quite unpleasant.

Once the opening to Sally’s throat was open Meghan had no problem getting out. She simply stood up in Sally’s stomach, and because Sally hadn’t learned how to hide meals once Meghan was standing up Sally’s lips were curled around her thighs, just above the knees.

Meghan leaned forward and fell onto the floor as the rest of her exited Sally’s mouth.

“I’m so sorry! What happened?”

Sally said.

“I lost my hold and the rest you know. Do you have any clothes that might fit me? I seriously need to get into the shower.”

“I don’t know. Go take a shower and I’ll see what I can come up with.”

Meghan hurried into Sally’s bathroom, she then removed her clothes and dried off as well as she could using a towel, then she jumped into the shower and didn’t come out of there until the warm water was running low. She put her clothes and the towel she had used before into the sink and filled it with water. Then dried herself off with a new towel which she wrapped around herself and went back into the room.

“It was as I thought I don’t really have anything. You can forget about underwear and the only thing that might fit you is a t-shirt Sarah left here. As for your lower body I can only offer you this sarong, but as you can see it’s very transparent. My clothes are all tight on me so there is just no way you’ll fit into any of them.”

Sally looked really ashamed, but then brightened up a little as she got an idea.

“Do you have anything against staying here for a bit longer? I could go down to the laundry room and wash your clothes. Hopefully they won’t take too long to dry.”

“Thanks that would be great! And if they won’t get completely dry it won’t matter, it is warm outside anyway so a little moisture wouldn’t kill me.”

Sally took Meghan’s clothes and went to get them washed up. Meanwhile Meghan put on Sarah’s t-shirt and wrapped the towel around her hips. She watched a little TV while she waited for Sally to return.

Sally soon returned and they spent some time chatting while waiting for the clothes to dry. They also ordered pizza and Meghan had half a mind eating the pizza delivery boy and letting Sally have the two pizzas, but she let him go and settled for a calzone.

As they talked the subject went from this to that and Sally finally asked.

“So what is the largest thing you’ve eaten?”

“I swallowed a car once, I didn’t digest it though. Just after that I tried our family’s SUV but it was too much. That was four years ago so I might be able to swallow it now if I tried.”

Meghan made a face.

“Take it from me, cars don’t taste very good.”

Sally just giggled.

“I guess they are hell to digest too.”

Meghan got a chill running down her spine as she recalled something that happened last week.

“I’m not so sure. I think you can digest anything as long as you know what you are doing. My scary sister proved this too me just before we moved.”

Sally was rather intrigued about the thought of a whole family specialized in vore.

“Yeah you said you had sisters. I’m the only child and my parents are in my hometown so I don’t see them much. How many brothers and sisters do you have?”

“I have two sisters. Kimberly my older sister turned twenty three last month. She’s always been my best friend but she’s done with collage and is looking for a job back in our old town, so unfortunately I won’t get to see her much from now on.”

“We have always been together, often with one being inside the others tummy. She’s great! Ohh, I miss her warm stomach.”

“What about your other sister? Don’t you fool around with her too?”

“Haley is just turned fifteen, I’ll be twenty two this year. I believe that was why Kim and I never played with her much. She’s just so much younger than us. And besides she’s always been a little weird.”

“Is that anyway to talk about your own sister?”

“Well you haven’t met Haley yet so you don’t know what I’m talking about. Because Kimberly and I never played with her and never did any thing vore related with her mom spent lots of time with her. Haley and mom go along great, but I can’t remember seeing Haley with any friends.”

“She also has the bad habit of digesting everything she eats which is one of the reasons why Kim and I never spend much time with her. I can actually count the occasions that I know she threw something back up on one hand.”

“Two years ago Kim and I thought that if we swallowed her and kept her in our stomach for a while, then maybe she’d realize that she wouldn’t have to digest everything she ate. So we planned to ambush her as soon as she got home, who swallowed her wasn’t important.”

“We waited Kim behind the kitchen door and I behind a corner and as soon as she got inside the door we jumped at her. Somehow she fell to the floor and Kimberly got a hold of her feel. So Kim sucked her in, but when she had Haley’s waist in her mouth she suddenly couldn’t get any more in, Haley was preventing her from swallowing any more.”

“I figured that I could help by pushing Haley in, but it didn’t seem to work either. Then Haley surprised us both. She took my hands and shoved them into her mouth and sucked me up like a piece of spaghetti in two seconds flat I was inside her stomach. Then she managed to get herself out of Kim’s mouth and soon Kim fell on top of me.

“Luckily mom got in just as she swallowed Kim and told Haley not to digest. Kimberly and I spent the whole afternoon and evening inside Haley’s stomach. It was just before she was going to bed that mom told her to throw us up, mom had come to the conclusion that I had to be inside Haley’s flat stomach too.”

“So Haley went to the bathroom and unceremoniously spat us out on the floor, and without a word went to bed. Kim and I just laid there for a while, we both realised that had mom not got in at the moment she did we would have both been Haley shit a long time ago.”

Sally finally spoke after listening to Meghan’s story.

“She wouldn’t have cared that you were her sisters?”

“I don’t know, she sure didn’t act like it would have mattered. Needless to say both Kim and I have left her alone since then.”

“I’m sure I would have too.”

Sally was interested in Meghan’s sister, Meghan had swallowed the whole class but she looked like she feared her little sister.

“What does she do now?”

“I guess she goes to high school, mom probably helped her get transferred like I did. But she always seems to be at home. Usually she’s studying, don’t ask me what, but I’ve found her reading my books and Kim’s too and as mom’s favourite guinea pig she gets a lot from mom to read too. She’s damn smart so I don’t know how much she understands of it. I still would be happier if the would come home with a friend for once and seem like a human being.”

“So when you said your scary sister earlier, you meant Haley, right?! You said she did something just before you moved here. What was it she did?”

Meghan told Sally the story.

A week ago just before they moved, Meghan took the buss home from school, and just as she stepped off the buss, it disappeared behind her. When she turned around she saw her little sister rubbing her bloated and gurgling tummy.

Meghan realized how close it was that she got eaten for real by her sister. Four other people were supposed to get off the buss here, but only Meghan did. Had Meghan not been the first person at the door she would now be churning in her sister’s gut.

Dumbfounded she stared at her sister.

“Hi sis!”

Her little sister said as she looked up from her tummy.

“You…you almost ate me!”

“Sorry about that, luckily I didn’t.”

Her sister looked down at her tummy again and kept rubbing it. The lump had now moved into her belly.

“But there’s plenty of room in my stomach now if you want me too.”

Meghan just stared at her sister for a while before answering. She watched as her tummy settled down and heard it stop making noises as it was now done with its meal. In about a minute Haley had eaten a whole buss full of people and completely digested it.

“No…no thanks I can do without visiting that pit of yours.”

Meghan had relaxed some when it got to her that she was really alright and that her sister wouldn’t eat her on purpose.

“I’ve never tried digesting anything other than food, people and clothes. Do you get any problems with all the other stuff the buss was made of?”

“No. I did get an upset stomach the first couple of times I ate a car, and even when those problems went away I got the same problems when I tried a plastic boat. I guess you have to let your stomach learn to handle new things. While I did manage to digest them, I got mild diarrhoea from doing so. I’m glad I don’t have those problems any more.”

Haley started walking and then stopped and turned around.

“Well should we go home, or do you prefer standing here? Our toilet is the only one I know that can handle the kind of load I need to unload.”

After listening to Meghan Sally admitted:

“Your little sister really does sound scary! Has she ever eaten any guests at your house?”

“She ate a few of my friends when she was younger, but she’s left them alone for quite some time now. Still I always recommend too keep a safe distance. You know, just in case.”

“So what does she look like in case I’d drop by your house?”
