Tamara startled by the professor shouting her almost in the ear, jumps back in chock before rummaging through her pockets.

She finds a bottle of orange liquid, from which she takes a large gulp.

She Bends over as her stomach clamps down and start to force Meghan back up her throat again. Meghan arrives feet first and land a bit slimy on the clod floor.

“Sorry professor! I thought she was just someone barging in here. You’ve told us to take care of unwanted visitors, so I wasted no time.”

Tamara said as she stood back up and looked over to the professor, who seemed to let out a sigh of relief rather than being angry with her.

“Yes I know, I just never thought someone would be that fast. I’m just glad you didn’t digest her, I would never have been able to explain that to Hawthorn.”

Tamara raised an eyebrow and looked at Meghan, whom she extended a hand to too help her get up.

“Hawthorn? What does she have to do with it?”

Fulpin motioned for Meghan, who said nothing but let the professor speak.

“This is Meghan Hawthorn, the professor’s daughter.”

Tamara raised the other eyebrow too.

“Ohh, I see.”

Then she turned her eyes back to Fulpin.

“But what is she doing here?”

“She wanted to learn more about vore, and I offered her to come down here and meet you girls. I figured if you got along you could teach each other some things. But before I let you exchange knowledge I have to get Hawthorn’s permission, seeing as it is her work Meghan has studied. But I figured none the less that I’d give her a tour of the lab and show her what some of you girls are up too.”

Tamara turned to Meghan whom she was still holding hands with, eventhough Meghan was standing up now.

“Ehh…Pleased to meet you Meghan, I’m Tamara.”

Tamara said and shook hands with Meghan. She then whipped some of the slime off of her and added.

“Sorry about that. At least I didn’t have any acid in my stomach, so that’s just mucus and some other slime. Nothing that’ll hurt you or ruin your clothes.”

Meghan brushed herself off and forced a slightly disgusted smile.

“Glad to her that, but how come you didn’t have juices in there?”

“You see I’m studying the small intestines, or more like ways of making them more effective. This has made me start to shove my meals directly into the intestines and not let the stomach do its work first. But that is no problem for my intestines they are capable of handling it.”

She made a pause and looked a bit awkwardly at Meghan.

“You should be glad that the professor got in when she did, because once in my intestines, I can’t throw anything back up and since I started here I have never hurried anything through, so I don’t know how you’d handle the trip.”

Meghan didn’t really know what to say to that, but felt she should say something.

“Well if you don’t mind I’ll pass any offer of finding out.”
1122111121111111111222221121.title: Up!

choices: Patricia
Something/Someone else.
11221111211111111112222211211.content:
“Well harmful or not, you look like you’d like to clean yourself off a bit. We have a large bathroom over here.”

Fulpin said and lead the way. Meghan and Tamara followed. And it was indeed a large bathroom. I guess if you study the digestive process, then thee has to be room enough for an audience as well as test subjects.

In it was a shower in one corner, a weird looking toilet as well as two sinks, one normal and one big one, the kind that you often find in laundry rooms. There were also a shelf with fresh towels and different bottles. Meghan noticed that there seemed to be quite a supply of the orange ones she’d seen before.

The toilet though nothing new to Meghan, she had one at home just like it, but for anyone else the large gaping hole that was where the bowl usually was would look weird. For anyone capable of digesting large meals and who did so on a regular basis these specially constructed babies were wonderful. Because it was made to handle massive loads, so that the user wouldn’t have to worry about plugging up the plumbing, or have to spend a lot of time in there squeezing out a little at a time. At least not if the user were like the ladies here, who could more or less push out all the remains at once and have it over with.

Meghan washed her arms off and the slime from her hair, then Tamara helped her removing the worst of the rest using a towel. It wasn’t like Meghan had been soaked in yucky stuff, it was just that the stuff was indeed a bit yucky, so she wanted it gone.

“I was wondering if there were any of these toilets in school! You know what a pain it is to get a meal down a regular toilet.”

Meghan turned to Fulpin.

“Professor are there any like these up in the usual school buildings?”

“Sure there are a few, but you need keys too be able to use them. Often they are behind doors that look like any other in the hallways, so that students should think that they’re just another door that students can’t get into.”

“So how do I get a key?”

“It’s simple, you don’t. At least you can’t get one as the rules are now.”

Fulpin changed her pose, tone and subject.

“So are we done here?”

Meghan nodded and Fulpin turned to Tamara.

“Well I took Meghan here so that she could get to meet you girls, so if you’d do me the favour of showing her around and introducing her to the girls, then there’s no need for me to tag along. It tends to get rather stiff when I’m around anyway, somehow I get ‘Yes professor!’ a lot.”

Tamara giggled and nodded.

“I’ll do my best. Or should I say ‘Yes professor!’?”

“Thanks!”

Fulpin said and poked her tongue out at Tamara before she left the two girls alone.

“So where should we start?”

Tamara mumbled as she thought for a while.

“How dumb of me. I have already started, well you know what I do I already told you, and since you didn’t want a closer demonstration I guess we’ll move on.”

Tamara said smiling and led the way.
11221111211111111112222211211.title: Tamara the tour guide.

choices: The tour continues.
Something else.
112211112111111111122222112111.content:
Tamara starts walking down one of the hallways with Meghan in tow. There is quite some activity here. The buzzing of machines can be heard everywhere, doubtless mostly computers. There is also the tapping of keyboards, the clapping of walking feet and the occasional groan and moan. Even talking can be heard.

It would seem most doors here are open, or at least ajar. And as Meghan walks past the doors she sees either an office or a laboratory.

Tamara and Meghan walk by several unoccupied rooms, well unoccupied in the sense that no one is there at the moment, there seemed to be something going on in most rooms and the light was on in every one.

Then Tamara stopped and knocked on a doorframe.

“Come in.”

Meghan saw a young woman turn around away from her computer to face them.

“Meghan this is Patricia…”

Tamara paused for a moment and looked closer on the Patricia’s stomach, which was left bare between a short dark skirt and a matching short top.

“and that is Evelyn.”

Tamara added and pointed to Patricia’s stomach.

“Pleased to meet you Meghan”

Patricia said and extended her hand, but before Meghan had a chance to shake it a voice spoke up from Patricia’s tummy.

“Patricia would you let me up so I can greet the lady?”

“Excuse me Meghan.”

Patricia said before she took a deep breath and leaned over to one side. Her stomach started wiggling around and soon her throat started stretching wider and wider. Two hands emerged from between her lips and grabbed hold of the sides of her mouth.

Then in a few massive jolts a woman’s upper body emerged from between her lips. The new woman, placed her hands onto the floor did a handstand as the rest of her body slid out from between Patricia’s lips. She then gracefully placed her feet on the ground and stood up.

The slime covered woman than now stood before Meghan who was just dressed in a bikini, extended her hand and shook Meghan’s.

“Hi I’m Evelyn.”

Meghan crooked an eyebrow feeling the still warm slime wetting her hand.

“How delightful, I’m Meghan.”

Meghan then turned back to Patricia and shook her hand.

“I’d apologize for the slime, but since it’s yours I won’t.”

Meghan said smiling and poked her tongue out.

“Well a little slime has never hurt anybody. When you work here you need to get used to handling much more disgusting things, and dangerous.”

“Excuse me ladies, I’m just gonna go wash this off, I’ll be back in a flash.”

Evelyn said and disappeared around a corner, and soon a shower could be heard.

“So who are you?”

Patricia asked Meghan as soon as Evelyn had left.

I’m professor Hawthorn’s daughter. I guess that’s the main reason as to why Fulpin let me come down here. Initially she offered to show me around and meet you all, but Tamara accepted the task.

Evelyn hadn’t been far away so she had heard them speaking and burst back into the room, she had got rid of the slime, but she was still wet and dripping water all over the place.

“Hey if you’re the daughter to a professor then you should know some vore!”

“Yeah I guess I do.”

Evelyn almost ran into Meghan, she didn’t though, but stopped just in front of her and poked her tummy.

“So can you hold of digestion?”

“Sure! Why do you ask?”

“Then do it.”

Was all the answer she got before Evelyn had pushed both her hands into her mouth and down her throat. Meghan got the idea and neutralized her stomach as she took hold of Evelyn’s hips. Meghan lifted Evelyn off the ground and slurped her up like a piece of spaghetti, that Evelyn helped just made the process even smother and faster. In no time Evelyn was gone, as Meghan’s stomach didn’t show any sign of Evelyn’s presence.

Tamara looked at Meghan’s stomach and so did Patricia.

“You’re good.”

Meghan looked confused.

“Huh? What did you say.”

“It doesn’t even show that she’s in there.”

Patricia said and pointed to Meghan’s stomach.

“Eh… what you mean? There’s just one girl in there.”

“Just one girl? Not all here can do that, and we are study vore as a full time job.”

Patricia pointed to Meghan’s stomach again.

“She can’t do it. She looks pot bellied when she has someone in her stomach.”

“Well how many of you actually study hiding meals then? My guess would be not that many. Am I wrong?”

“No, but everyone practice it more or less with every meal.”

“That’s not the same thing and you know it.”

Meghan changed the subject.

“So what do you study? Tamara said she was into digestion in the small intestines, but since Evelyn was in your stomach I guess that’s not what you do, unless you two were just fooling around.”

Patricia smiled.

“Nah I guess we were doing a bit of both working and fooling around. You see I study how to keep someone in your stomach.”

Patricia pointed once again at Meghan’s stomach.

“Evelyn studies how to get out of one, so we compliment each other.”

Patricia looked a bit confused.

“I’m surprised that Evelyn hasn’t made her way out of your stomach yet. Do you know techniques of how to keep someone inside?”

Meghan giggled and patted her stomach, feeling how Evelyn squirmed around in there.

“Nope, I don’t know anything about that. I guess she’s just enjoying herself in there.”

Meghan looked down on her tummy.

“Well maybe it is time for her to get out of there?”

Meghan crouched down and brought Evelyn back up her throat. She leaned forward and let Evelyn slide out of her mouth and onto the floor.

Tamara addressed Evelyn

“That was about time!”

And Patricia filled in.

“We were getting worried you’d lost your touch.”

Evelyn had her eyes wide open in an almost chock-like expression as she pulled herself off the floor.

“I didn’t break out, she spat me out!”

“So you didn’t want to leave? Was it really that nice in there?”

Tamara giggled.

“No! No! You don’t understand. I did try to get out of there, but it was like a big freaking banquet hall. Man her stomach has to bigger than the professor’s and Tracy’s put together! I just couldn’t get out of there.”

Evelyn turned to Meghan.

“You have to let me practice getting out of there sometime!”

“Sure! Maybe you could instruct me on how to get out of yours too? I wouldn’t mind learning some of your escape techniques.”

Evelyn broke into a huge smile.

“It’s a deal.”

She said and grabbed hold of Meghan and opened her mouth wide. She would have had Meghan halfway into her stomach before Meghan would have had an idea of what was happening. Tamara however had a feeling of what was about to come as well as fast reflexes. So she broke in before Evelyn got Meghan’s head into her mouth.

“Not now Evelyn! You can do that some other time! I’m supposed to show Meghan around.”

Evelyn released Meghan and pouted out her bottom lip as she patted her sexy tummy.

“And my stomach isn’t part of the tour?”

“No, not today it isn’t. She’s already been in mine, and that’s enough spelunking for one day, I’m sure.”
112211112111111111122222112111.title: Let me introduce…

choices: Meghan walks up to the woman.
Meghan turns to Tamara.
1122111121111111111222221121111.content:
Tamara turned to Meghan.

“So shall we continue?”

Meghan waved to Patricia and Evelyn.

“Bye ladies, see you later.”

And she set of after Tamara who had already started walking down the hall towards the next stop. Meghan walked slowly by Tamara’s side looking about, when a voice called out from a room beside her.

“Oh Tamara, you are an angel!”

Meghan looked at the owner of the voice who happened to be a well curved and quite trim beautiful brunette, who stood just inside the doorway in just a bikini and she was all wet, looking like she just came out of a shower.

The gorgeous woman looked at Meghan and gave her an inviting look while pointing on the floor in front of her.

“Why don’t you come over here?”
1122111121111111111222221121111.title: The tour continues.

choices: Tamara tells the woman what she just did.
Tamara runs of to tell Fulpin.
11221111211111111112222211211111.content:
Meghan didn’t waste any time, but walked over to greet the woman.

But she shouldn’t have done that, because as soon as she got within reach the woman lunged at her and quickly swallowed her up whole. Meghan made a bulge as she travelled down the woman’s throat, but it disappeared as she entered her chest.

The woman’s stomach rumbled noisily welcoming its guest, while the woman sucked her fingers and sexily licked her full lips.

“Mmm. That was delicious, and just what I needed.”

She patted her stomach which started to quiet down. Meghan had almost not slowed her decent down the woman’s body at all as she entered her stomach. Because the stomach had been filled with fierce juices that awaited her arrival, she had simply melted away and continued on into the woman’s intestines.

The woman turned around so that she faced away from Tamara, who looked on in chock as she woman teasingly pulled her thong out from having been wedged in between her cheeks, and started walking away.

“Well is seems she wants to come back out.”

The woman giggled and headed for the nearest toilet.
11221111211111111112222211211111.title: Close and personal.

112211112111111111122222112111112.content:
While Tamara turned tails and ran to tell Fulpin the grim news, Nicole, the vivacious young beauty ambled casually to the nearest toilet, teasingly patting her belly. "Mmmmmmm mmmmm! You sure were a tasty little thing. You sure seemed to travel through me fast, were you hoping to see the inside of me." She giggled as she pulled her thong down and sat onto the toilet. "Well, sorry to disappoint you, but I have a very voracious appetite, and am to impatient to let some hot young thing like you just sit in my belly. Sorry, but my stomach makes fast work of cute little things like you. Don't worry, though, you might smell a little, but I'm sure when you come out you will be just as beautiful as when you entered.

Nicole let out a grunt as a large, brown turd, began pushing out of her anus. The log coiled around several times, forming a heaping pile, before the last of it exited her cute little anus. As the girl began to urinate the liquid wastes of Meghan, she let out another evil giggle, "Well, I was wrong, your actually as ugly as you smell. Don't worry, though, were your going, everyoneone you meet will be as ugly and foul scented as you. Thank goodness for modern sanitation, ehh, love? Heh, don't worry, though, lots of men have met the same fate as you, so maybe you'll meet a nice guy turd and hit it off. Although, sex i out of the question, shit doesn't reproduce by itself, it has to be, well, shit out of someone else to grow in numbers. Oh well, look on the bright side, at least I have a momento of you. I think my butt just grew a little bigger, so whenever I have anal with my boy toy, I'll think of you, the fat that makes my ass so adorable!"

Nicole gave one last laugh before giving the toilet a flush, sending Meghan spiraling down into the murky dephs of the sewers. Meghan did, however, meet her husband within the dank depths, for a few days later, Nicole deposited another victim down the toilet, a teen male by the name of Milke. The two became close friends, realclose since he landed on top of her, and well, fecal waste can't move. Although they never had any kids, a nasty fungus did grow over the two of them, binding them together forever in an entwind marriage.
112211112111111111122222112111112.title: Your Cells are Added to Her Booty, Booo-ooty, Boo-

choices: Next stop.
Something else.
11221111211111111112222211211112.content:
Meghan stops and looks questioningly at Tamara.

“Hello Nicole.”

Tamara says and places her hand on Meghan’s shoulder.

“This is Meghan, professor Hawthorn’s daughter. Fulpin asked me to show her around.”

Tamara gestured at the exotic woman.

“Meghan this is Nicole.”

“Pleased to meet you.”

Meghan said and extended her hand as she took a few steps towards Nicole. Who shook her hand and forced a smile on her face. Her stomach rumbled a little.

“Nice to meet you too. Although I thought Tamara had brought me a snack.”

“Oh you greedy guts, don’t you eat enough as it is?”

Nicole’s stomach emitted a few noises to tell that it didn’t think she did.

“I guess not.”

She said and patted her belly trying to calm it down a little.

“So what is it you study?”

Meghan broke in.

“I study ways to avoid getting digested.”

“And how do you do that if I may ask?”

“Currently I’m trying to make my body secrete different things to keep stomach acids and enzymes and stuff from getting to me and also to neutralize them.”

She turned away from Meghan and made a motion towards a number of containers inside different laboratory fume hoods. Inside each container some slime was being attacked by different mixtures of acids and enzymes.

“The reason as to why I walk around here half naked is that when I need a new sample of goo, my body secretes the stuff all over. This way I can easily take a shower afterwards and wash it off.”

“So does it work this slime of yours?”

“It does in theory, the problem is that most who are experienced in vore start producing things that the stomach normally doesn’t, so it is hard to make a universal slime that protect you from everything.”

She made a pause and rubbed her tummy.

“I haven’t tried it out yet so I don’t know how well it would work in reality. Besides, I don’t like being in other peoples stomachs, I prefer having them in mine. Well you have to excuse me ladies, because now I just have to get something to eat.”

She walked by Tamara and Meghan and disappeared down the hall, even though her body had dried off by now her hair was still dripping wet and she left a trail of droplets floor behind her.

Tamara spoke to Meghan as soon as she thought Nicole couldn’t hear her.

“Now she’s always ravenous. I think it is weird that someone who studies defensive measures eats so many people and is always on the attack. I’m quite sure no one here eats half the number pf people she does. But then again she needs building materials for that slime of hers so maybe it isn’t so weird, just ironic.”

Meghan nodded her head.

“I guess it is. But there’s one thing I don’t get. Is she going outside to hunt someone like that?”

“No she’s just going over to our storage. We always keep some snacks around. And we often need test subjects. That was why she thought I was coming with a snack because they most often have no idea of what we are going to do to them, and as she’s always hungry I’ve brought her some before.”
11221111211111111112222211211112.title: Nicole

choices: Next stop.
Something else.
112211112111111111122222112111121.content:
The two of them start walking again and Tamara stops to open a closed door. The lights are out inside the room so she turns them on.

“I guess Daniela has gone home then. Too bad I would have liked you to meet her.”

Meghan looks inside the room and is surprised to see the things she sees in there.

“A car? And a boat?”

“Yeah, you never know what to find in here.” Tamara giggles.

“You see Daniela studies swallowing large objects. It is quite a sight to behold when she’s in action.”

“Yeah, I guess it adds to the fear factor when you see something huge go down one’s throat.”
112211112111111111122222112111121.title: Light’s out.

choices: End the tour.
Something else
1122111121111111111222221121111211.content:
Tamara turned off the lights and closed the door again.

“Well she’s not here to give us a demonstration, so I guess we could move on.”

The next stop was at a little fancier office. Tamara knocked on the doorframe.

“Excuse me Doctor.”

Inside sat a tall brunette bent over her keyboard, and she didn’t look up when she answered in a rather playful tone.

“Drop the formalities Tamara, you know I don’t like it.”

“Sorry Tracey, it’s just that I’d like you to meet someone.”

Tracey looked up rather surprised.

“Meghan this is Doctor Tracey. Tracey this is Meghan.”

Tracey got up from her chair and greeted Meghan.

“So who might you be? You look a little young to be a post graduate student.”

“I’m professor Hawthorn’s daughter. Fulpin offered me a tour of the place and Tamara agreed to show me around.”

Tracey giggled a little. And got confused looks from both Meghan and Tamara.

“Well I just cant imagine our professor with kids. So a professor with children just seems a bit weird to me. I can’t say I’m that interested in getting any myself. But I’m sure you’ve had an opportunity to learn vore like few have. Or haven’t your mother told you what she’s been working with until you were quite old?”

“No she showed us at rather young age. I was about to turn five the first time I swallowed Kimberly my older sister.”

“How old is she?”

“Twenty four. Why?”

“Ah, then it’s not the same Kimberly. She’s just twenty.”

“Same as who? And I’m twenty two, but thanks I guess.”

“Kimberly is the name of a girl who volunteered last semester to be test subject for a study we run along with some ladies over at the physic faculty.”

A mischievous smile crept over her pretty face. A large lovely mouth and blue tingling eyes framed by long black hair made her look very sexy as it did.

”Well it’s more like I give them information they need and study their results and they do all the hard work.”

“Continue, tell her what you do.”

Tamara ushered on as Tracey grew silent.

“Oh isn’t it little Miss nosy?”

Tracey poked fun of Tamara.

“Well I guess it is harmless. Mostly just monitor the work going on around here and the project I told you about. Other than that I’m always looking for a vacant professorship to fill. I have been studying a few things, but now I don’t concentrate on anything particular, I pick up a subject as I feel like it, meaning that I have a few unfinished things lying around that I can work on when I have time to spare.”

“So what do you do Meghan?”

“Well currently I’m just studying math, biology and chemistry. Basically so that I can join a research team like mom’s or yours when I’m done. I don’t feel that vore 101 has anything new to teach me so I asked professor Fulpin if she could start a more advanced course, and that was more or less the reason as to why she offered me to come down here.”

“Yeah I’ve heard about that, your mom and the professor spoke to me about it, they have been to the school council and are awaiting their decision. Or maybe they got words today, I don’t know. They just asked me if I would consider holding a few lectures for such a class and I told them I’d be delighted to.”

“That’s great! I didn’t know if Fulpin took me seriously or not. Hopefully I’ll see you in class then.”

Meghan said giddily as the stepped back outside since Tamara had motioned that they should continue.
1122111121111111111222221121111211.title: Doctor.

choices: Meghan goes back outside.
Meghan continue exploring.
11221111211111111112222211211112111.content:
Tamara leads on and looks about, finally stopping at a door.

“Well there are more girls here, it just seems they’ve gone home for the day. With the exception of Akio who hasn’t been here that much at all the last couple of weeks. I must say that I’m a bit interested in what she’ll come up with.”

“Akio is a Japanese girl, and she has looked into their history. She found that it would explain a lot if the real geishas knew vore. So now she is studying what she can find about the ways of the old Japanese traditions and reads just about everything she can find about geishas.”

“I don’t know when she is leaving, but the professor has already arranged for her to go to Japan and see if she can find something out.”

Tamara gets a dreamy look in her eyes.

“Just think if they do. I mean, you can say what you want about the Japanese, but they never do anything half assed. Look at their craftsmanship everything is body and soul a way of life that’s either done to perfection or not at all.”

“I can’t say, I honestly don’t know much about the Japanese.”

Meghan admitted and looked sort of confused as to why they stopped here if there wasn’t anyone here. Tamara noticed her expression.

“Well I guess the tour is over, because you’ve met everyone that’s here at the moment.”
11221111211111111112222211211112111.title: No more.

choices: Meghan goes over to her mom’s lab.
Meghan heads home.
112211112111111111122222112111121111.content:
Tamara leads the way back to where they first met, and they both step through the large metal door.

“Thanks for showing me around.”

“No problem, I hope we meet again soon.”

“Well if that advanced course gets started we most likely will, there’s bound to be a need for talented TA’s.”

“Then let’s hope so.”

“Tamara, there was one thing I wondered. Where’s my mom’s lab?”

Tamara pointed down a long corridor.

“If you go to the end of that corridor, you’ll be able to see a door like this if you look to your left. It’s behind it. But do you really think you should go over there?”
112211112111111111122222112111121111.title: Out of the lab.

choices: The door…opens.
The door remains shut, the light might signal something else…
1122111121111111111222221121111211111.content:
Yeah, mom’s usually the last one to leave on Fridays. So as I’m already here, I might as well get a look at her lab. Besides I’m curious about whether she’s ok with me swapping knowledge with you. Fulpin said she’d ask mom, but mom hasn’t brought it up.

Meghan stated noticeably eager to get over there already.

“Bye then.” Tamara says signaling farewell. “Hope she approves.”

“Take care!”

Meghan answers before she starts walking fast down the long corridor, leaving Tamara behind, who returns to her lab to finish whatever she was supposed to do earlier.

The corridor really was as long as it looked like and once the steel door closed behind Tamara, the only thing breaking the eerie silence is the tapping noise of Meghan’s shoes as she picks up the pace.

At the end of the corridor there is a door straight ahead and a short corridor to the right with only a single door to the right. And too the left another rather long corridor stretch out how long is hard to tell because only the closest lights are lit so the end of it lies unseen somewhere in the darkness ahead.

But that’s unimportant for now. More interesting is the familiar looking door that is just where Tamara said it would be. It looks just like the door leading to professor Fulpin’s lab down to the slightest detail, even the light on the lock shines green to signal it is unlocked.

Meghan sighed, she had feared that it might be locked, but it wasn’t sure yet, there just might be something wrong with the display. She grasped the handle, pushed it down and pulled…Oh goody!
1122111121111111111222221121111211111.title: Hawthorn’s Lab

choices: Go ahead.
No just tell me.
11221111211111111112222211211112111111.content:
Meghan opens the door enough to get inside and let the door slide shut behind her. She looks around and sees a woman looking up from what she was doing, seemingly a little surprised. The woman stops what she was doing and comes over to greet Meghan, even a smile comes to her lips, but there is something business like about it. But then again there is something business like about the woman in general, who is a curly redhead with a full body, a bit thicker than average not plump or fat, but somehow there seems to be more of her than of the average woman. She’s dressed in a tight semi long sleeved top and a nice pair of cotton pants that gently hug her feminine curves.

“Hello there!”

Meghan puts on a smile in return and they shake hands.

“Hello I’m Meghan.”

“Alectra. What can I do for you?”

“Professor Fulpin gave me a tour of her place and I thought I’d drop by to see what was happening over here.”

Meghan pauses and a very confused Alectra tries to make sense of her words, her face doesn’t show much though and Meghan continues before she comes up with anything to say.

“So what is it you do?”

The straight forwardness of Meghan catch Alectra off guard, but she knows she just can’t let anyone in here.

“Well most of us are working on the same project, though each one more or less on their own at the moment, because we explore different ways of getting similar result, and then we are going to combine our different methods and experiences to achieve a better result.”

“I can’t tell you very much of the other ladies work, but mine is rather interesting. It would be easiest if I showed you though.”
11221111211111111112222211211112111111.title: Hawthorns team.

choices: Continuation 1
Continuation 2
112211112111111111122222112111121111111.content:
“Well go ahead show me then.”

Alectra took hold of Meghan and opened her mouth wide. Then she promptly swallowed Meghan whole in one swift motion.

Once inside Meghan felt around while waiting for Alectra to tell her what was going on. Was it getting wetter?

Sure enough some sort of liquid was starting to flow freely in there and Meghan began to panic as it was already knee deep.

“Calm down. The liquid is harmless on its own.”

Alectra comforted Meghan and patted her stomach.

Meghan was glad to hear that. And as she was soon swimming in the stuff she did notice that it didn’t hurt her at all, it was slightly thicker than water though so she was more afraid of whether or not she would have the endurance to keep afloat in the stuff. And if the flow didn’t stop soon there would be no surface to break in there. Luckily it did and Alectra explained things to Meghan.

“The liquid is something I finally have managed my body to produce. It is very potent because it is filled with all sorts of enzymes and stuff, but at the same time it is harmless because everything is dormant. This means that an activator has to be added to make the components start to work.”

Meghan started feeling uneasy when she knew that she was swimming around in some sort of super digestive mix. And it had taken Alectra only a couple of seconds to fill her stomach to the brim with the stuff.

“You know what an activator is right? Well anyway you asked me to show you.”

And with that Alectra made her body add something to the mix in her stomach.

The reaction was violent, almost instantly Meghan was reduced to an evenly distributed nutritious soup, which was now being sucked into and absorbed by Alectras intestines.

Soon Alectra’s body was done with Meghan and she went to the bathroom to relieve herself. As she did it was clear that something was different, somehow there wasn’t as much left of Meghan as one would have expected. In fact there was a lot less left of her, though Alectra didn’t seem surprised by this.
112211112111111111122222112111121111111.title: Showtime!

choices: Meghan catches someone’s attention.
They reach Meghan’s mom’s office.
112211112111111111122222112111121111112.content:
“No please just tell me.”

Meghan said.

“I’m not sure I can do that.”

“Why not? I’m Professor Hawthorn’s daughter, so you don’t need to worry about espionage if that’s what the problem is.”

“Oh you’re the Professors daughter!? Why didn’t you say so at once? I almost turned you into a midday snack!”

“Well I thought you knew, I didn’t want to state the obvious. Like I said, Professor Fulpin showed me the way down here so I thought I’d take a look in here and see if mom was around if nothing else.”

“If you really are Hawthorn’s daughter then I don’t see any harm in giving you a little tour.”

“I am, don’t worry.”

“Well then, we are all working on different ways to absorb more of a meal. In the end we will combine our techniques and experiences and hopefully get a great result.”

Alectra said as she stared walking down a hallway and Meghan could see people behind some of the doors, weirdly enough most doors seemed to be left open.

“The whole idea is that if you can absorb more of the meal then you can go for longer periods of time without eating and also lessening your number of meals. As an added bonus there is less waste to get rid of when the meal has passed through your body, something that I believe most would appreciate. At least us experienced girls who tend to digest our meals in one go and not over a period of time. What I mean is that normal toilets usually can’t handle the kind of strain we often put on them. When we are done with this we won’t have to worry about finding a custom made toilet for our needs.”

As they had walked a bit Meghan understood why the doors were open, the people here used them too much for there to be any meaning in closing them again. Women seemed to pop out of every opening only to disappear into another, often carrying something with them.

“Won’t you just grow fat, if you absorbed more of the meal?”

Meghan said as she came to the conclusion that even though there was a laboratory behind almost every door, the equipment in them had to differ, thus all the running about.

“Well you could if you didn’t get your body to handle the meal properly. Again it is a matter of knowledge techniques and hard work. This obstacle we have managed to get past though, so our bodies handle it much like it hides meals, meaning that you don’t look any different if you are good enough at it or unless you eat more than you can handle.”
112211112111111111122222112111121111112.title: No just tell me, please.

choices: Out, home!
Alectra talks to Meghan.
1122111121111111111222221121111211111122.content:
“Looks like your mom is still in her office.”

Alectra says as they round a corner and see that the door to Professor Hawthorn’s office is open.

Another few steps and they both stop at the door opening and Meghan knocks on the door frame.

“Mom, are you busy?”

Professor Hawthorn drops the papers she’s holding and swing her office chair around to face the girls.

“Meghan! What are you doing here?!”

She shouts almost upset, which startles Meghan a bit and she stutters.

“Eh…I…Fulpin has given me a tour of her lab and when I knew you were still here I thought…”

“What if someone wouldn’t have recognised you when you stepped in here? Did you ever think of that? The work we do here is quite secret, especially since the public can be let to know nothing of it.”

The professor pauses for a second or two to catch her breath.

“You…You could have been eaten dammit! Meghan the girls here are told to eat intruders! And I’m not so sure you’d been able to stop them!”

A bit baffled Meghan lets her words sink in for a moment.

“I didn’t think of that, sorry! I actually thought you had shown your researchers who your daughters were so they wouldn’t try to eat us.”

“Well I never saw a reason, you were never at risk before, and Kimberly haven’t ever been close to my team, and they have all met Haley so they know to stay away from her.”

“Mom I’m attending the same school as your team is on, I really would appreciate if you told them to keep away from trying to eat me…And why is it they know Haley?”

“I’ve brought Haley to the lab on several occasions, she’s even been here since we moved. Now you wonder why I always do things with Haley instead of like I did when you were younger and use all of you girls.”

“It is because you and your older sister have had a whole lot more to do with your studies than Haley has, so she’s been free to help me. On top of that she is still growing, which has proven to be a big bonus, and she has a talent to learn new things. Sorry to say it but she’s always been much better at learning new things than both you and Kimberly.”

Meghan can’t really argue with her mom.

“Well at least you are honest, but I’m not so busy I want to miss out on learning new cool things. Back in our home town there wasn’t many who knew vore, or did I just miss them? Around here anyone can be a hungry voreaphile and I’ve started realising that I’ve only sparred with Kimberly, I don’t know if I’d be ready if someone jumped on me.”

“I guess you are right, maybe I should let you in on Haley’s and my little discussions at home, but please don’t come down here before I tell you it’s safe.”

Meghan nodded and took over.

“You know I’ve asked Professor Fulpin to start a new class.”

“Yes, I actually thought it was a good idea, that way we get better trained researchers from the beginning. And seeing how popular vore 101 is, I don’t think there’s going to be a hard time finding students for it.”

“So what’s the status of it? Will there be one this semester?”

“It looks like it’s going to be, the school board said that we should make ourselves ready to start, and that they would come with final terms on Monday. Sounds to me like a yes if ever I heard one, but it seemed they really had some issues they wanted to discuss amongst themselves first.”

The good news seemed to tear the tension in the room away and Meghan was almost giddy as she hugged her mother and turned back to the door.

“Great! I’ll see you at home then.”

“Alectra would you please make sure that Meghan get out alright?”

The professor said and Alectra nodded before she escorted Meghan to the door.
1122111121111111111222221121111211111122.title: Hi mom!

choices: Meghan gives it a try.
Meghan declines and heads home.
1122111121111111111222221121111211111122.content:
As they move down the hallways Alectra can’t keep quiet any more, her curiousness doesn’t shine through though, she’s well in control of her emotions and the business like image isn’t broken.

“So you say you’ve only sparred with Kimberly? What about Haley?”

Meghan looks around before answering.

“Well at first she was just too young to play with, I mean she’s seven years younger than me. And when she grew older, she started to simply creep Kimberly and me out, so we never really got that sister bonding with her.”

“Oh, sorry to hear that, she’s good you know. So what’s so bad with just having sparred with Kimberly? The way I got it you’ve been practicing vore for quite a while, so even if she’s the only one you’ve sparred with, shouldn’t she still be one hell of an opponent to practice with?”

“One would think so, but we usually let each other swallow the other, so there wasn’t ever much fighting practice. The only such I ever really got was when finding someone to eat, but you know how easy none vore people are to eat.”

“Yeah, its almost silly. Can’t help but wonder, was I really that helpless once?”

Meghan giggled as she opened the steel door that shed come through earlier.

“Yeah, you probably were.”

Alectra raised an eyebrow and stepped outside after Meghan.

“So have anyone jumped on you here yet?”

“No, not yet, well Tamara did, she certainly took me by surprise, but Professor Fulpin intervened.”

“I see. Would you like to try your skills against me?”

Alectra said as the door shut behind them.
1122111121111111111222221121111211111122.title: Curious.

choices: Meghan decides to learn from Alectra
Meghan decides not to learn from Alectra
1122111121111111111222221121111211111122.content:
"Sure," Megan said.

"Great," Alectra said, "I've been waiting for a good sparring partner."

Alectra and Meghan circled around each other. Each woman was taking her measure of the other. Alectra was calm and confident, but Meghan was nervous. She held her hands in front of her face, in a martial arts fighting stance she had learned from a friend that had taken karate.

"Relax, baby-cakes," Alecta said, "I promise not to digest you if I win." Hearing that, Meghan dropped her hands to her sides, but remained ready for anything.

Smirking, Alectra made the first move. She lunged at Meghan. She reached out to grab Meghan's shoulders, and was prepared to take the girl's head in her mouth. Meghan saw this and, using reflexes she didn't even know she had, twirled to her left, while shoving Alectra's shoulders. Alectra was sent stumbling forward. Taking advantage of Alectra's momentary opening, Meghan grabbed Alectra's ankles. In a smooth move, Meghan pulled Alectra's feet out from under her, while sucking them into her mouth. She moans as she feels Alectra slid smoothly down her throat, and into her stomach.

"Oh...urp...you were so delicious, Alectra," Meghan said.

"And you are better than you thought you were," came Professor Hawthorn's voice. Meghan looked to see her mother leaning against the wall, and smiling.

"I...uh...didn't mean to...," Meghan said, "Alectra asked to spar, and..."

"It's okay, Meghan," Hawthorn said, "You're good. In fact, I think I'll let you come here whenever you like."

"Really," Meghan asked.

"Of course," Hawthorn said, "Alectra's got a lot to teach you."

"But you said I was good," Meghan protested.

"You are good," Hawthorn said, "good enough that Alectra can teach you more about sparing with another voraphile. She can make sure you know how to protect yourself, should anyone try to eat you. What do you say, honey? Would you like Alectra to teach you how to protect yourself from getting eaten? You might even be able to spend time with Haley without ending up inside her stomach."
1122111121111111111222221121111211111122.title: The Match

choices: The Sun is still up.
2 It’s dark.
1122111121111111111222221121111211111122.content:
“Some other time, Alectra.”

Meghan said farewell to Alectra and returned to the room where she had met professor Fulpin earlier. It was closed now, and Fulpin was obviously not there, so she figured it was time to go home.

Meghan realizes that she doesn’t have any idea off how long she’s been here, with no clock and with no windows she’ll only have a vague idea when she comes back outside.
1122111121111111111222221121111211111122.title: Home

choices: She visits Haley.
She calls someone.
1122111121111111111222221121111211111122.content:
As she opens the door Meghan is surprised to find that it is still bright outside, the sun probably wont set for another few hours.

The clock in her car reveals that her visit only took a little over three hours, meaning that she might still be able to make plans for tonight. But then what to do, what to do?

Arriving home she’s determined that whatever she’s supposed to do, she’s got to take another shower and get some new clothes. She brushes of some of Tamara’s mucus, that’s formed a dry crust at places before she goes into the house.

She wanders about idly for a while, should she call someone? Sally maybe? Should she stay home and maybe go out and get someone to eat?

Her steps takes her to the backyard, where she finds the poolside empty apparently Haley is done with whatever she was up to. And a glance at the pool tells that it is without water and that it is not refilling, that makes a little fun by the pool out of the question.

Meghan continues to walk around, figuring that it is better to make plans before getting ready, so that one knows what to get ready for.

The TV room is empty. No damn it not TV on a Friday night, at least not alone.

Kitchen, also empty. Meghan looks at her tummy, yeah she should probably eat something, but in that case she’s more interested in eating someone. Going outside to get someone to eat isn’t exactly something that takes the whole evening so even though she should probably do that, what should she do after that?

By now it’s clear that Haley is probably upstairs studying something, maybe something interesting.

Meghan figures that it is probably a good time to come to better terms with her little sister. “Haley did say she could play nice too, didn’t she?” Meghan thought to herself as she continued to ponder what to do.
1122111121111111111222221121111211111122.title: Night is still young.

choices: Haley stays.
Haley joins the hunt.
1122111121111111111222221121111211111122.content:
Meghan figured that it wouldn’t hurt to look what Haley was up to before deciding how to occupy herself for the evening.

Soon enough she knocked on Haley’s door.

“Come in!” Could be heard from inside.

Meghan opened the door and was faced with a rather surprised Haley sitting by her desk in what wouldn’t pass for the average teenage room. Sure there was a large cosy bed, maybe unusually large since it was square and so big that Haley could lie in either direction and she was a bit taller than most.

There was also a desk with a computer, so far so normal. But then there were two more desks both covered in books and papers. On both sides of both these desks stood bookshelves packed with every sort of book normal teenagers would stay away from, as far as Meghan could remember she’d never seen Haley with your average novel in her hand.

At one of these book laden desks was where Haley was seated, still wearing the bikini from before, but she had also put on a pair of tight low cut jean shorts.

“Hi Haley, what are you up too?”

Haley lifted an eyebrow. “Isn’t that obvious?”

Meghan rolled her eyes as if to say “Duh!”

“So you are studying, but what are you studying, there are quite a few things one could look into in the world.”

“I figure it has to do with vore one way or the other though.” Meghan added and stepped into the room.

“Yeah, but why are you interested in what I’m studying? You’ve never shown any particular interest in it before.”

“Well they teach vore at school here you know and I realised that there were aspects of vore that I have never really looked into and some I never heard of.” Meghan said as she walked up to where Haley was sitting.

Then she added: “Today for example I visited mom’s lab and Alectra told me how they studied ways of absorbing more of a meal, meaning that there would be less waste to get rid of too. You do realise how convenient that would be? No more need to find special bathrooms.”

Haley looked even more surprised than before. “Funny you say that. It is Alectra’s and a few other of mom’s researchers most resent reports that I am studying.”

“Most resent? So you know her techniques?”

“Well, I wouldn’t do that far. They’ve been at this absorption task for a while now, but all I get is reports to read. It’s not like they are any good step by step manual. Luckily I’m familiar with the terminology, but it is still rather frustrating. I do visit the lab every now and then, and talking to them gives much more than any report does. But yes I’ve made progress from what I’ve been told and read.”

“So, you know all the girls takes on developing absorption techniques?”

“Yes.”

“So how does it work?”

“Jump in and I’ll show you!” Haley said and opened her mouth impossibly wide.

Meghan who stood just next to her felt like she would fall into the gaping hole which was large enough to take her on standing upright, and instinctively she found herself jumping a good meter backwards.

“No thanks Haley, I think I’ll pass.”

Haley closed her mouth and gave Meghan a mischievous smile. “I was just kidding. Though come to think of it I am a bit hungry.”

At the mentioning of the “Hungry” word Meghan’s stomach rumbled signalling that she was getting a bit hungry too.

“I guess I am too.” Meghan said and rubbed her stomach lightly as if to hush it.

“Would you please bring something back for me when you go out?” Haley said and fluttered her eyes in a pleading fashion, trying her best to overdo the cuteness.

“Oh, when you said you were hungry I hoped you’d come with me.”
1122111121111111111222221121111211111122.title: Haley

choices: Meghan upchucks one of the boys.
Something else.
1122111121111111111222221121111211111122.content:
“I don’t feel like it Meghan. Could you just get something for me too this time? Please!?”

“Well alright, don’t expect too much, I’ll probably just take the first ones I see.”

Haley didn’t seem to happy to hear that, but mumbled in agreement as Meghan turned to leave. “Well I guess beggars can’t be choosers.”

“Right, I’ll be right back then.” Meghan said and soon she walked out the front door.

There wasn’t that many people out so after having walked down the street Meghan was happy to see that shaded by a couple of big trees was a bus stop and at it stood the only two people she could see except for herself. This was just too easy.

The two boys at the bus stop noticed her too, in fact they were eyeing her quite thoroughly.

Meghan when she got closer saw that the two people were in fact two boys, rather average built for highschool seniors such as they were.

“Now you’re not taking the bus away from me now, are you boys?” She said succeeding quite well in both getting their attention and surprising them.

They had figured she was way out of their league so when she approached them in the manner she did they had both trouble finding words, so Meghan continued for them.

“Ohh, you’re not the threesome kind? Well I think my sister would have something to say if I tried to keep you both for myself anyway.”

Meghan could see their eyes and crotches bulging ever wider, their brains overflowing with information that they couldn’t quite handle. Hence the boys still found no words.

“Don’t worry, she looks quite a lot like me, so if you like me you’ll like her too.” With that said Meghan had stepped right up to the two boys that stood almost shoulder to shoulder.

“I hope you don’t mind if I make you miss that bus of yours and take you home with me instead.”

Meghan didn’t wait for a reply, but instead put her hands on their sides and pushed the boys together while she opened her mouth wide and quickly swallowed up their heads and shoulders.

Another push and they were forced face to face and also made easier to swallow. In one motion Meghan had them in all the way to their waists. Then she lifted them up over her head and sucked in the rest.

With them positioned right in her mouth she swallowed them down. They made a small lump travelling down her throat, but once in her stomach there was nothing to tell of their presence.

Meghan looked around and made sure no one had seen her before she started walking back home, enjoying the boys pathetic struggles in her stomach.

Meghan walked back into Haley’s room with a weird expression on her face.

“I feel like a bird mother about to puke up some food for her chick.” Meghan said giggling.

“Well this little chick of yours is mighty hungry so come on and feed me.” Haley mocked back.
1122111121111111111222221121111211111122.title: Something to eat.

choices: Meghan calls Sally.
Meghan gets Haley away from her papers.
1122111121111111111222221121111211111122.content:
Meghan stepped up to Haley. “Well open wide my little chick.”

Haley did as told, but instead of getting any food Meghan stepped away from her.

“Well maybe not quite that wide. Try it again.”

Meghan waited until Haley’s huge mouth had reached a less intimidating size before she stepped up to her again.

Inside her stomach she started forcing one of the boys to the entrance of her throat. The other however tried his best to hold on and get a ride out of there.

When she had them both back in her throat she could feel that one was clamping on to the other ones legs. It took some concentration, but she managed to make her throat work both ways at once forcing one guy up and the other one back down.

To her powerful muscles the boys stood no chance and the one holding the other soon lost his grip and plunged back into Meghan’s stomach.

Haley was getting inpatient when a she heard a short shriek, that got muffled as something impacted on her tongue. Then she felt the rest of the form enter her mouth as the first of it slid into her throat. A little swishing around as she closed her mouth behind her meal informed her that she had gotten a young man, and unfortunately he still had his clothes on which made him rather tasteless. Since he was no fun she promptly swallowed him down.

Once Haley had him in her stomach Meghan looked at her intensely. “Now can you tell me how to do some absorbing tricks?”

“Nope, it’s not that easy. All the techniques involves controlling several muscles and making your body produce different things. So no I can’t just like that tell you how to do it. Besides the first thing you’d have to learn is to handle the extra mass so that you wont just end up getting fat, and that’s a chapter all in its own.”

Meghan looked rather put down by that and let her stomach have at the boy she had trapped inside. Needless to say it didn’t take long before her body was finished with him.

Haley on the other hand was taking things a bit slower with her meal, if she was just getting a little boy she was determined to absorb every crumb of him that she could.

“I can’t tell you what to do, you’d be better of reading and asking me what you don’t get.” Haley looked down on her tummy and added. ”I could give you a demonstration of the results though.”

“No thanks, I’m not interested in watching you take a crap.” Meghan frowned and then changed her tone. “So how long have you studying this?”

“Hmm… A couple of months I think, maybe a little more.”

“That would explain a bit. I always wondered how you got that bus down the drain.”

“Yeah these techniques helped a bit, but you’d be surprised at what those toilets can handle.”

Meghan senses that this is getting nowhere and is considering finding something else to do.
1122111121111111111222221121111211111122.title: Open wide.

choices: Slumber party!
Slumber party?
1122111121111111111222221121111211111122.content:
“Somehow I’m not that interested, I’ll leave you to your reading. See ya later sis.” Meghan said and left Haley in her room.

Behind her Meghan heard a surprised “Bye.”, and she went to her room and called Sally up on her cellphone.

“Hello?”

“It’s me Megan! I was wondering if you’d have any plans for tonight, I’m actually rather bored.”

“Well I just got over to Sarah we were gonna have a sleepover, watching some movies and so.”

“Can I join you?”

“I’ll ask Sarah.”

Sally turned away from the phone as she raised her voice a little so that Sarah would hear her from the other room.

“Sarah, Meghan wonders if she can come. Is it ok?”

Sarah stopped what she was doing and looked rather puzzled as she went closer to where Sally was, Sally also went towards the room Sarah was in.

“What Meghan?”

“You know…”

“THAT Meghan!? You know her?”

“Well yes.”

Sarah turned to look at Laura and Melissa neither of them gave her anything more than confused looks.

“Well I guess it’s ok.”

Sally turned back to her cellphone. “You heard that?”

“Yepp, what’s the address and I’ll be there soon.” Meghan said smiling.

Meghan hurriedly got herself ready, she relieved herself of the boy and had a quick shower. Once dressed she went to her sisters room.

“Haley would you tell mom that I’m sleeping at some friends house tonight?”

“Sure, no problem.”

Moments later Meghan tossed a sleepingbag, a pillow and an extra set of clothes into the passenger seat of her car and drove over to Sarah’s house.
1122111121111111111222221121111211111122.title: Calling Sally.

choices: Bad movie.
Good movie.
1122111121111111111222221121111211111122.content:
Meghan walks up the stairs with her things tucked under her left arm and the front door opens to reveal a cluster of heads all looking at her.

“Hi, I’m Meghan.”

“They know that, now come inside.“ Sally said and maid way for her.

Meghan rather awkwardly stepped inside and closed the door behind her, before facing the girls.

“But I don’t know who you all are.” She said as she dropped her stuff on the floor and extended her hand to the closest unfamiliar girl.

She then worked her way through the present girls. There were Sarah, mistress of the house and then Laura. Both Sarah and Laura were a bit overweight, not fat, but still wouldn’t be hurt by loosing more than a few pounds, and they both had rather short dark hair, other than that they didn’t look much alike.

Being yet a size bigger was Melissa, though somehow she managed to look aye ok even with all that extra weight.

And lastly was this lean girl called Annette, she wasn’t skinny it was just that compared to the other girls her tight little body looked like it had been depraved of nutrition, in fact she was quite the looker.

Well of course let’s not forget Sally who was more average, just standing about a head shorter than the rest.

After a few minutes the girls had gathered in the living room drawn the curtains so that the last fading sunlight would be shut out, littered the place with mattresses, blankets, pillows and all other sorts of sleeping gear. They had also managed to decide what movie to watch first as well as gotten into their “pyjamases”.

It was a bit hard to tell what the girls were wearing really for everyone except Meghan was wearing an oversized T-shirt, so what the girls wore under or didn’t wear under it only they themselves knew. As for Meghan, she had just wiggled out of her tight jeans and settled for sleeping in her panties and small top.

Now they had all snuggled up to watch a…
1122111121111111111222221121111211111122.title: Slumber party

choices: She’s found some fruits.
Sorry no fruits…
1122111121111111111222221121111211111122.content:
Annette picked up the cover of the film. “Laura, why the heck did you rent this?”

“Well, these kinds of movies are often more fun then good movies, since you can track down on everything sleazy, cheap, far fetched and outright bad in it, not to mention that it doesn’t really matter if people speak while you watch it since you really wont miss anything worthwhile anyway.” Laura replied in defence of having rented the first B-movie she saw with aliens on the cover.

“Sarah, where’s the snacks? If we are gonna watch a lousy movie we have to have snacks!” Melissa said giggling.

Sarah got up to head for the kitchen when Meghan stopped her.

“Where are you going the snacks are right here.” Meghan said with a waving motion and then reached out for Laura who kind of gracefully managed to lung herself up in the air and land in a pile a few feet away.

“I was only kidding!” Meghan managed through a fit of giggling, the frightened look on Laura’s face was priceless.

She managed to collect herself, and avoiding looking at Laura she added. “You don’t have any fruits at home do you Sarah?”

“I’ll have a look. What do you have in mind?”

“Oh never mind, maybe it’ll be better than this movie.” Meghan said with a mischievous smile.

Once Sarah had gone into the kitchen Melissa spoke up, she clearly could care less for the movie that was running.

“Oh come on Meghan, tell us, please!”

“Nope, you’ll have to wait until Sarah comes back.”

So for the next few minutes the girls waited and hardly even commented the movie.

Then finally Sarah comes back.
1122111121111111111222221121111211111122.title: B-movie

choices: Let’s have a look at the fruits.
Something else.
1122111121111111111222221121111211111122.content:
Sally comes back into the room carrying a fruitbasket and a couple of bottles of sprite.

*Chapter 600!*

You and Rachel exchanged a long, scared look as a low murmur buzzed around the classroom. Many of the girls, however, seemed to be aroused rather than afraid, and this made you and Rachel all the more concerned.

"I'm glad we're partners in this class!" you whisper. She smiles and nods.

"Now, you all should know, I could reduce the size of my belly if I wanted, and still have the gal inside me. Or, if I wanted," she added in a lower voice, "I could disposed of whatever is in my belly before you could say Jack Robinson."

The professor's belly seemed to have obtained a voice at that moment. In fact, it started wriggling around a lot. Nobody but Fulpin could really hear what was being said, but they could tell someone inside was pretty scared.

"Well now, I'm not really in the mood for a meal now. What I really wanted to do was fill you all in on the background of the art of vore."

"Please turn to your books...you'll find a chapter entitled "history" and another entitled "background." Let's go over the background chapter now."

after anothe belch and gulp of air, the professor continued:

"We talked about, in the first class, how females of many species can swallow live prey their own size whole. Human females, however, can do a lot more than just swallow a mate.

In the old days, in the 'wild,' as we might say, the natural order of things would be for a female to mate with a male, releasing huge amounts of special pheromones that stimulate him to a degree no artificial sex enhancer ever could. He also tends to react to this by releasing his own potent pheromones and by being able to climax up to forty times...in a row."

a sharp intake of breath could be heard from around the room, followed by giggles. you went from shock to embarrasment as you realized that the eyes of half the girls in the room came to rest on you. Thankfully, the professor continued...

"of course, biologically speaking, that would be a waste. That is, unless you count the fact that each time the male climaxes, a new egg is fertilized in the female...meaning that a large number of embryos can be created from one sexual encounter.

To support all of these little ones, the female needs a huge amount of energy. Thus, when the male is spent but still overwhelemed and aroused by the female's pheromones, she, assisted by her own feelings and hormones, will be able to easily swallow her mate alive and digest him. The mate usually doesn't feel any pain. His body will fuel the growth of the multiple fetuses...some of which will eat each other inside the moher's womb and grow bigger."

"While it is possible for a female to digest a male without...well, exterminating him, and to birth him back at a later date, if she does this, she will not be able to support such a large number of embryos. Eating a different meal immediately after sex will mitigate this somewhat, but she will have the largest 'yield' of offspring if she digests her own mate. It is also the natural instinct, provided tthat the right simulation and hormones are in place."

"I know this is crazy, but I will continue for just a second. After the babies are born, the female's usually large mammaries will be able to support all the children...let's say that there are abou 36 left by now. however, within about 12 months, probably only 30 will still be left. At that point, they stop preying on each other as they develop rapidly, the ones who have eaten their siblings reaching puberty by...oh...about three years of age if all is done the natural way. Only a few will mature that fast, but once they do, they will enjoy devouring those of their siblings that are just entering adolescence. The mother will be left, by the end of five years, with about ten extremely strong and healthy powerful young ones..."

"oh, I forgot to mention. by five years of age, most boys will have developed so that they cannot eat females, and so they will either be eaten by their sisters or they will leave...or will be lucky enough to have something worked out. So, out of those ten mature children, maybe seven of them will be female and three male....in most natural populations."

"It is at this point that it is customary for the mother to give her body to the most mature girl...who really has the body of your average college sophomore by now, except much more strong and developed...as a meal. This will give that young woman incredible physical benefits which I will not enumerate here...she also tends to become the "heir" to the family property.

Sometimes the mother doesn't want to give herself up, and then the lead girl can usually overpower her with her pheromones. but often the mother will let the lead girl eat one of herr full-grown brothers, an occurrence which doesn't happen so much among full-grown children except in this case. Sometimes a mother will find a substitute male meal to give to her daughter, but in that case it's best to choose a male that's genetically more similar to her daughter. Or to choose one that's really arousing."

"Oh well, that was probably too much for you all to take in. note that I'm not describing exactly what every modern vore student winds up doing...I'm describing the natural human instincts of the developed human female. So, don't start thinking that I'm going to have you have sex with and then eat your boyfriends. I'm not a pervert...I'm a professor."

Professor Fulpin laughed heartily, and then resumed,

"Personally, what fascinates me about vore...well, there are many things, and they can change if I've had too much to drrrink," she laughed..."but the thing is, I love how it winds up giving up females such power over our own bodies. This beats yoga and karate, folks...I even know one beautiful young lady from Constantinople who was born in the days of the East Roman Empire...the Byzantine Empire to you students...the half of the Roman empire that didn't acually fall in 476. Anyway, she was born in 1050 A. D., almost a thousand years ago, dring the glory days of the Empire. She was of imperial blood...and knew everything about Vore, though she didn't share that with the very Christian emperor!"

Words cannot describe the murmur that ran around the room, creating almost a roar.

"Yes, it's true, she's an irresistibly beautiful and enchanting woman who lives by the old rules. I don't know how she does it, but there are a few people who can live for amazing amounts of time."

"Anyway, I've spent mostt of the class talking. But I want you all to understand that this isn't a cannibalism class. This is about coming into your own as women in a way that nothing else is. This is...ah...to hell with it all....this is like becoming your own God."

132111211121111111111211111.content:
"Hey Rachel," you say as you leave class. "Let's go to Theodora's tonight. I think they're having a sale and a local Renaissance music group playing there from 7-9pm."

Theodora's is a local restaurant/diner-type place a few blocks toward downtown.

"Hey, sure Alexios...should we meet here?"

"How about at the library at 7?"

"Sure thing. I have to run to a rehearsal now, but I'll see you then."

You both finish up your afternoons before heading out together for dinner.

Sure enough, as you entered the restaurant, a small group of musicians were playing away in the center of the small place. There were two violas da gamba, a pair of woodwind players, a percussionist, two lute players, and a soprano...eight in all. They were playing all sorts of music and even taking requests from some of the more erudite members of the audience.

You let go of Rachel's hand and handed them a book of music with photocopied parts, of some French music compiled by Andre Philidor. "Think ou guys could manage this? I love this stuff...all these royal pavanes and dances..."

Pretty soon the room was filled with courtly dance music, and a few couples actually started dancing. You and Rachel, however, sat in a corner and ordered dinner.

As the waitress approached to bring some bread and appetizers, you quickly leaned over to Rachel and whispered something. She beamed and then started laughing. The waitress smiled and brought the food. "Having a good time, hey?" she asked.

"Oh yes. thank you. And we'd like a pair of pepsis too, please."

After she turned around, you quickly grabbed the small loaf and gulped it down.

"Uh, miss..." you called out, as Rachel buried her face in her hands, shaking in suppressed mirth.

"Yes, sir? Would you like something else?"

"Uh, yes, miss, a loaf of bread, please."

She looked puzzled, but seeing no loaf on the table she apologized and went to bring another loaf.

She soon returned, with a nice warm loaf and two Pepsis.

"Thank you, miss," you replied politely. Rachel was unable to find words.

But when her back turned, she gulped down her entire glass of pepsi, and you ate half of the loaf.

"Uh, sorry to bother you again, miss, but I think we may need just one more loaf of bread. It's really good, you know," you added.

She smiled, and then noticed the empty glass on Rachel's side. "Oh, and I'll reffill your Pepsi too, miss."

Rachel was trying not to belch too loudly, as she realized that swallowing all that pepsi had consequences!

Soon, however, the food arrived, along with another loaf and pepsi, and the Renaissance band had finished the Philidor and began playing Watkins Ale.

"Hey, Rachel, good job! I'm impressed. I can outdo you, though, you know."

"Oh really," she joked back, though somewhat bashfully. It was obvious she wasn't used to having this kind of fun, but clearly was enjoying her newfound powers as much as you were.

"Yes, see this? I'm going to eat this entire pirogie in one bite."

"Well, I can eat my chicken wrap in one gulp, but then I won't enjoy it as much. But..." she couldn't resist.

By now, a couple people across the room had sttarted to stare, but you just glanced at them and they turned back to theirr own food.

"Okay then, Rachel, I'll top you. I'm going to take down this Greek salad all at once."

"Oh, Alexios...don't!" she said, laughing. "They'll see you" she added, whispering.

But you had already picked up the little place, put it to your face, and took in the whole salad in one go.

"There," you said, wiping your lips. "I win."

Just then, the waitress appeared again.

"Open the books to page --, and we will start discussing ways to get the throat to stretch further. Eventually you will be working on making it conceal things, but for now, we're just trying to build up the basic skills to the point where you can actually swallow something bigger than your own head, and eventually, by the end of the semester...or even by midterm if you're quick, you should be able to swallow your partner. Then we will have to talk about controlling digestion and all that. The bushes are not thick at all, and they're barely tall enough to conceal a kneeling girl as tall as Laura. Her head goes up, leaves stroking her face, and she looks around like a periscope on a submarine.

Her dorm is somewhere directly forward, and there's a left turn she has to take pretty far down, it's like the third fifth Y-intersection or something on that sidewalk, there's usually signs so she doesn't actually remember. But she can't use the sidewalk, so she looks to her left and sees that the grassy area behind some other buildings doesn't have any light. She gets up smoothly and walks in that directly, keeping at a normal pace. People will notice if someone is running, and to be honest, Laura still can't really run with such a stomach unbalancing her center of gravity.

As she disappears into the darkness, she looks back to see if anyone's watching her. Some people's heads are facing a bit towards her, but no one seems to be focused on searching for her. It'll have to do, though. She presses onwards to the dark behind one of the buildings. Once out of sight, she takes a look around. In the distance, there's an area lit as the grass meets a road, but other than that, she can just walk along this side of the building. And so she does. It's a long walk, and she soon slows down, her stomach contents sapping her energy as it weighs her down and her body works hard to start absorbing some of it all. She sits down on the grass and tries not to think about bugs as she gives herself a rest.

Maybe she could just wait out here for a few hours? As she thinks it, a breeze picks up and she realizes that the night is getting colder, and her clothes are ripped from stretching and barely protecting her at all. No, she's going to become miserable if she tries to wait it out here. She reluctantly gets up and keeps walking for what feels like forever.

The building ends, though, and Laura contemplates where to go next. Walking along the edge of the woods to the left might work, but that would be veering from the areas she recognizes, and in this case, she can't exactly ask for help. The alternative is to risk going through the light and then be free to follow an unlit sidewalk with no one immediately nearby.

She chooses to go onto the sidewalk, starting to get impatient and knowing that making her sneaking take long will just make her stressed and cold and have more long-term adverse effects. The light illuminates her figure for a period of time, but she had scanned the area properly and it seemed that no one saw her. She goes back into the darkness and follows the sidewalk, and maybe she's lucked out...

141112212212222.content:
The faucet runs, gently splashing around in the sink before it begins to drain. That sound reverberates off of the ceramic tile lining the walls and floor, and fills the entire restroom with a bit of white noise. The white noise helps Laura concentrate as she stares into the mirror, examining her face. She splashes some water around her mouth, she tries to wipe away any possible eye crust, and begins to take in her own appearance.

This is Laura. This is what she has become. She still has her same short, dark hair and cute nose, her square jaw, her brown eyes. Yet even though it is all the same, she takes in the fact that these features describe her. This is what the world sees when it looks at her. Once she's done being introspective, she backs up away from the sink, continuing to let it run water, and tries to fit as much of her body into the small rectangle of the mirror. Her shirt is torn, but her stomach is again back to a normal size, having finished her second meal and let it out in the commode. She takes the shirt off completely--she doesn't have a trim figure, but her breasts still push further forward than her belly, so she's getting meaty but not fat. A momentary flash of anger passes through her head as she considers the idea that lots of douchebag guys would call this being fat, which leads to so many girls with body image issues.

She takes Sally's shirt and stretches it tightly over her torso--her bra easily pokes through visibly. Laura's 5'11'' height and thick body type does not always get flattered by tight clothes. She generally sticks to looser fabrics or layered outfits, and she still looks sexy, if she does say so herself. Her face falls at this realization that it's only her own head that's called her attractive recently.

It's amazing how people's minds can wander and focus on menial things. This is how killers can kill without conscience.
